story:
and here Game Jolt or here Indie DB
Please, pay your attention, a lot of gameplay mechanics are not ready yet.
See the full list of future improvements below.

Star Souls is a single-player roguelike-like tactical sci-fi game. Star Souls will target the PC/Mac/Linux.

The player controls several fleet spaceships. The task is to overcome the route from several randomly generated sectors of the galaxy with many star systems. The player is invited to explore unknown worlds, engage in battles with other spaceships, perform tasks and improve the fleet. Death in the game is irreversible, you cannot return the destroyed ships.

Star Souls includes roguelike elements at all sublevels: sector map is generated randomly, lots of miniquests and battles occur merely by chance plus the player can play for any of several races with totally different spaceships. The outcome of quests is ambiguous and can lead to various consequences.

Travel through the dying galaxy, where you can handle emerging enemy threats, search the salvation for all the intelligent races and perform different missions.
 

Battles occur in real time with a tactical pause while the player should redistribute energy between the on-board systems and watch the serviceability of the fleet spaceships, avoid meteorites and hazardous fields, hide in nebulae and make way through trash.

THERE ARE MANY WAYS TO WIN:

  • Blow up everything you see!

  • But you don’t have to do it. Using various weapons you can destroy the crew of the enemy, and get his spaceship! Sometimes opponents surrender without waiting for you to incinerate them. :)

  • Your ship is weaker than the enemy? Don’t wait until you’ll be blown up – ram hostile spaceship! Using the environment, you can cause additional damage to the enemy, pushing his spaceship to a flying asteroid or in a dangerous nebula.

  • Smell hell on the battlefield? Take off using a Jump Drive, of course if you have some fuel...

 

The game offers 30+ spaceships of playing races, many non-playing enemy ships and over 30 kinds of weapons. You can customize and upgrade your spaceships as well as install various modules on them.

Each of your spaceships will be important during the game. By installing a specific module on the ship, you assign it a special function in your fleet.

We make many different modules. Some of it improve the parameters of your ships, for example, speed up the reloading of weapons, the restoration of the shield, increase the capacity of the generator.

Other modules will fundamentally change the gameplay. For example, using a transporter you can take on boarding enemies, and a giant shield, generated from a certain ship, will protect your entire fleet.

You can upgrade each of your spaceships. But you won't have enought money to upgrade it all. So you should plan every step, because the dreadnought upgrade will affect your manner of the combat.
 

The game produces story events that lead to combat, bonuses/negatives, and many number of fantastic in-game scenarios. You can choose one of three playable races. At the same the quests will be slightly different that will look at the situation from different perspectives.

The action takes place in the distant future in a galaxy so old that for some inexplicable reason the stellar matter in it began to disintegrate.

The galaxy is inhabited by three highly developed civilizations using a kind of "superfuel" to move among the stars. Due to the so-called paradox of Hirschstern none of the spaceships using the superfuel ever managed to escape from the cataclysm. It deprived all intelligent beings of the hope of salvation beyond the galaxy.

Pallada, mining complex. Extraction of superfuel.
"A gloomy World of swamps is the legendary second home world of Unity. Pallada which used to be so stingy with presents had given to Unity an invaluable gift – the one the native land was unable to grant. Mellow depths of the World of swamps were hiding a mystery compound which could produce tremendous power. It was from this planet that Unity began the exploration of the galaxy."

Snake-like Verdans, insect-like children of the Hive and upright walking members of the Unity – they were all trapped and filled with horror as they watched the stars die one by one destroying the exquisite multiculture that had been developing for millennia.

Unity ships Deimos and Phobos. Arrival to the Pallada (artistic reconstruction).
"A long time ago Unity managed to get over the conflicts and left their dying homeland for a new planet that would accommodate and feed them. Only two Unity ships arrived to Pallada. It were Deimos and Phobos."

Nobody knows who spread the rumor about the Transition – a loophole allowing to escape from the dying galaxy bypassing the paradox of Hirschstern. Driven by last hope, the governments funded the initiative to search for the Transition. Thousands of scientific and reconnaissance drones as well as hundreds of scout and military ships were sent into space. Many had disappeared, many returned unsuccessful.

You are the captain of the last spaceship sent with the mission to find the Transition. The resources provided to you are extremely scarce and certainly not enough for the challenging task you are to fulfill. Let's be honest, your chances for success are very low but nothing is impossible.

Stunning atmospheric Star Souls soundtrack will remind you of deep space and interstellar travel. Immerse yourself into the songs of the stars and let you carry away meet travel.

This is preview compilation of the Star Souls soundtrack. Enjoy!
 

Star Souls will be voiced over in English and in Russian. Particularly, we'll voice over the introduction and final videos, Galaxy News and feedback to your commands to the ships.

We have already voiced over advertising and news in the game shop. Player can find more information about the universe from it. Sometimes it's something funny, sometimes it's tragic. Star Souls soundtrack and voice-over let you feel the mood of the galaxy you travel.

Please, listen to the sample of a beautiful and flexible voice of announcer Marina Priemko.
 

STILL NOT SURE IF YOU'D LIKE THE GAME?

and here Game Jolt or here Indie DB
Please, pay your attention, a lot of gameplay mechanics are not ready yet.
See the full list of future improvements below.
 
 
We've got some cool rewards for those who support us on our way!
 
 

Star Souls Digital Download: Every backer donating $15 and more (and 40 first backers donating $10) will receive a Steam or GOG key to Star Souls game when it’s released.

Desktop Wallpapers 4K: A special gift from our artist Dmitriy Leonovich includes awesome digital space arts in 4k. All in all, there are 8 theme arts. The larger the pledge, the more arts you get.

You in the Game Credits: We’ll be happy to introduce in the game credits those who helped us at this important moment. Under certain conditions you’ll be mentioned as a gold or platinum backer.

Digital Artbook: A stunning digital artbook reveals the process of creating game art and contains sketches and additional details about Star Souls universe: description of galaxy sectors and the history of races.

Access to closed Beta: Backers will get access to our closed beta through Steam.

Name for a Spaceship: Create your own name for a ship and we’ll add to the list of random names. It must contain no more than 14 characters and should be decent.

Digital Soundtrack: Star Souls game comes with an original soundtrack by Belarusian composer Anton Orsher. It includes 22+ tracks – all together more than one hour of great music. We will present our backers with this amazing electronic soundtrack composed with love and inspiration.
 

Signed Poster: Every member of dev team will sign a “Star Souls” poster with your name on it (or another name provided by you) and we’ll send it in a package to your mailing address. Backers will be able to select from 3 different posters. All of them are 16.5 x 23.4 inch ~ 420 x 594 mm.

Letter of Gratitude: This is a personally addressed hand-written letter of appreciation that we’ll send to your mailing address.

Coloring Pages: Relax and reduce stress with Star Souls coloring pages. They are specially designed for our backers and based on Star Souls game art styled of the sci-fi 80s-90s. You won’t find anything like this anywhere else. You’ll get 20+ different coloring pages 9,45 x 9,45 inch ~ 240 x 240 mm.

T-shirt: Want an incredible T-shirt like ours? Choose right size, sex and one of Star Soul prints.

Create a custom event: Our narrative designer will create a game situation based on your ideas. The game will include a situation modeled by you, a special battlefield and an enemy with the name you’ve chosen. This opportunity will be provided only to 7 backers.

Create a custom spaceship: Work with us to create your own spaceship. Our artist will draw it and later it will appear in the game. You can provide your sketches or detailed description of the ship and we’ll bring your idea to life by introducing this ship to the game.

 

By the time of launching Star Souls with crowdfunding the game is more than 50% ready. If we raise the required sum here the game will be launched in 2018. We’ve drawn most of the graphics but there’s still much work left with artificial intelligence. Besides, we want to add several features that will significantly improve and diversify the gameplay. We mostly create the game using our own resources. However, in order to complete it we need to pay the Unity developer and sound designer.

We’ve passed more than half of the way and we’re not going to stop. The pre-order of the game will help us bring all our ideas to life.


 

If you tried the demo, you have a question: What will we be adding between now and release?

  • The system of spaceships upgrading. The player will be able to improve the spaceship’s subsystems, increase some characteristics like power, hull HP, etc.
    - Done! please see the DEMO v.2
     
  • Boss battles. Some of points on the star map will provide you with unique and epic boss battles to put your fleet to the test.
     
  • Modules. You will be able to install various modules, for example transporter, boarding capsule, heavy rocket launcher, stan beam, shield regeneration accelerator and many others. An installation of modules assign a special function to the ship.
     
  • Races. The player will be able to play on behalf of three playable races. Each has unique weapons, spaceships and quests.
     
  • More weapons. In the game will be more additional weapons (Lasers, Gauss, Missiles etc.) and special weapons (Sensor or Engine Jammer and others).
     
  • Star Map. We will add mini games and improve the gameplay in the star map so travelling from point to point will be much more interesting.
     
  • Universe. In will consist of 10 galaxy sectors. Every sector is distinctive, and can be passed by many ways. We add different ways to win: capture, avoiding battles or fight with all. Every sector will have a story event which will lead to plot ending.
     
  • In-depth tactical gameplay. It implies various elements on the battlefield which will make the gameplay more tactical – hostile nebula, black holes, teleport...
     
  • Soundtrack. We are planning 22+ tracks. While written are only some of them but our sound designer will be working hard to give us an amazing music.

Visit our PRESS KIT on the STAR SOULS WEBSITE

where you can find more information about Star Souls game and DrankiKets team. Here you can download images, videos, and branding assets that you may need.

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

  • What’s the release date? This is the most important question. It will be 2018.
     
  • What platforms will the game be released? Star Souls will target the PC/Mac/Linux first with other platforms later on (Nintendo Switch, iPad).
     
  • What languages will the game be released? Star Souls will be released in English and Russian. Translation into other languages will be done as far as possible and feasible.
     
  • Why don’t you show what the representatives of different races look like? Because our artist doesn’t feel like drawing characters and would rather draw space and spaceships. Kidding. We just let the players stretch their imagination.
     
  • What happens to dying stars? A star doesn’t explode in the conventional sense. Rather, it comes unraveled, leaving a gas nebula behind it. In this case all planets, naturally, die.
     
  • Will the game be on Steam and on gog.com? Yes, Star Souls game will be on Steam and will be available through gog.com, so we will provide keys to backers who want to receive their game this way.
     
  • When I will get rewards? Physical rewards will be sent when the game is released.

story:
Despite the mud that still covers their breastplates, their armors' jewels still shine. 

Despite the faces contorted by the hardness of the game, pride and sufficiency is still seen in their eyes.

The linemen are enduring the harsh rush of rivals.

The most accurate quarterback in the league is increasingly pressured by the strength of rival blitzs. Finally raises his arm and throws a pass that rivals rub with their fingers, but it is impossible to intercept!

The catcher possessed by the spirit of the lion that carries on his shoulder, catches the ball with a feline movement and the fans hail the run to the line of lime that marks the end of the pitch. Touch Down!

The stadium goes wild with the heroes who have won the match in the last minute . But the only winners are superior smiles . 

Now their only worry is to clean the blood on their armours so their gems shine again.

All hail the noble elves. All hail the Silver Arrows.

 

 

What will I get if I back this campaign?

Good question!

You will get the full Noble Elf team (see picture above and details in the gallery) composed by 16 miniatures: 8 linemen, 2 blitzers, 2 throwers and 4 catchers, and all the free stretch goals that we can unlock.

All the miniatures will be cast in high quality white metal.

UPDATE:

If you back the campaign before July 17th, you will get completely for free Zandra, the Noble Hunter, Star Player.

After this date, there will be no way to get this miniature through the campaign, it will be available at www.starplayershop.com


Also there are add-ons and free stretch goals that will be available when we reach the required goal.

The team has benn sculpted by S. Torras and mastered by E. Suarez. All the miniatures have been sculpted digitally.





Special Add-ons

In order to reach higher goals and unlock more miniatures and faster, we have created some special add-ons. These add-ons are Star Player Miniatures products.

We have available all our teams (basic version, 12 miniatures + a big guy) for 75 euros (retail price 85 euros) and all our miniatures catalog for 6 euros.

To get these add-ons you have to be a backer of the elf team.


When will I get the team/teams?

We are on a stage of preproductio, so everything is quite advanced, but August is a terrible month for bussiness, so probably the production will finish during September.

As always, we will work as fast as possible to shorten timing.


Who is Star Player Miniatures?

Star Player Miniatures is a small and young company composed by four Fantasy Football fanatics and friends.
Playing FF for a decade, we know what coaches want. Our intention is to produce our "dream miniatures" to play with.

We have been deeply involved with the Fantasy Football community. We run the largest tournament in Spain, Reva Bowl, for 8 years, and now we go one step further with a more ambicious project such as Star Player Miniatures. 

This is our fifth project, you can check our previous works at www.starplayershop.com

We work with the best sculptors and the best printers to get top quality miniatures.

story:
The Project.

Recently, miniature range of SD/chibi style is growing and I would like to extend those ranges, giving the fans the oportunity to populate their adventures places with more diversity.

The project idea is to offer groups of monsters and characters from different environments, designed with inspiration from classic RPGs.

The first miniatures group is a group of monsters from the place I named “The Haunted Tower”, and they represent ghosts, giant bats, wraith, jellies...

As the project objetives are reached, more miniatures will be added to this group, and also news environments with news thematics, accompanied by monsters and characters related. As example "The Frozen Wastes" or "The Goblin Fort."

 

 

The Miniatures.

Although the size for each figure will depend on the monster represented, all figures are designed to fit with a basic human (chibi style) of 2.2 cm to eyes and around 2.5cm to the top the head.

All figures are offered unpainted. Some of them will require assembly.

A round base will be includ with each figure. The base size is 20mm for normal size miniatures and 40mm for the largest.

Miniatures are casted in resin.

 

 

The Models.

The miniatures are divided into two groups. (Group1 and Group2)

Depending on the type of Perks you can choose one or more miniatures one of these groups.




 

Options.

You can also add our miniatures as option to your Perk! (Except in the Perk; "Thanks !!")

Just add the amount of the miniatures you wanted and don't forget to tell which one you want in a comment with your Perk.

 


-  Add 3 € for every model of Group 1.

-  Add 4.5 € for every model in Group 2.

(Remember that 3 little jellies are considered a single model in Group 2)

 

 

WIP

 

   - Big jelly.

 

 

   - Little jelly.

 

 

   - Wraith.

 

 

 

 

 

Shipping costs.

-  Free worldwide shipping cost.

 

 





 

All "Advance" contributions or higher will receive a copy for the first hero by FREE !!. The Cleric.

----------------------------------

You can also add The Cleric as option to your Perk! (Except in the Perk; "Thanks !!")

The cleric is considered a miniature of group 1.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The first figure of the new environment is a goblin warrior (Group 1). This model is currently locked.

Although the size for each figure will depend on the monster represented, all figures are designed to fit with a basic human (chibi style) of 2.2 cm to eyes and around 2.5cm to the top the head.All figures are offered unpainted. Some of them will require assembly.A round base will be includ with each figure. The base size is 20mm for normal size miniatures and 40mm for the largest.Miniatures are casted in resin.
 
 
The Models.
The miniatures are divided into two groups. (Group1 and Group2)Depending on the type of Perks you can choose one or more miniatures one of these groups.


 
Options.
You can also add our miniatures as option to your Perk! (Except in the Perk; "Thanks !!")
Just add the amount of the miniatures you wanted and don't forget to tell which one you want in a comment with your Perk.
 

-  Add 3 € for every model of Group 1.-  Add 4.5 € for every model in Group 2.

(Remember that 3 little jellies are considered a single model in Group 2)
 
 
WIP
 
   - Big jelly.

 
 
   - Little jelly.


 
 
   - Wraith.


 
 


 
 
 
Shipping costs.-  Free worldwide shipping cost.

 
 

 
All "Advance" contributions or higher will receive a copy for the first hero by FREE !!. The Cleric.----------------------------------You can also add The Cleric as option to your Perk! (Except in the Perk; "Thanks !!")The cleric is considered a miniature of group 1.

 

 
 
 
 

 
The first figure of the new environment is a goblin warrior (Group 1). This model is currently locked.

中文 (11/5 update!)

Have you ever fallen in love with a video game characterーーー?
The word “Virtual Relationship” has gained attention recently through all sorts of media. Us, KOYONPLETE offer a visual novel from Tokyo that makes every girl feel“Doki Doki”. From the previous edition which was themed  “sushi personified” called “Love! Sushi Rangers” was a huge success towards a lot of girls - not only in Japan but also from all over the world. Our Facebook page gained over 380,000 likes and achieved 7 million total downloads on our visual novel applications, and we will continue to further expand towards the success.

This time, we have decided the theme of our new edition “School of Witchcraft and Wizardry”! You are the heroine of a student in the school of witchcraft and wizardry and you will experience all sorts of elements within the school life including encountering, growing up, and romance. You will be able to enjoy a whole new system with cool new features - decorate your own room, customize your avatar’s wardrobe, mini games, and receive messages from your crush/lover. Every month a new scenario will be updated. Through the method of crowd funding we would like to have more people to know our game, and every support we receive will be towards the development and translation costs. We will try our best to have as many people as possible to enjoy our game. We greatly appreciate all of your support.



Allie Quilter（Available to change the name you input）
Born into a family of gifted magicians she is the weakest member.
She likes making sweets and is a little spontaneous by nature. She is gentle but strong willed. 

Cyril Posford

Born on August 22nd,170cm,58kg
Pawn Class: A gifted shapeshifter with a talent for performance magic.
He is best at adopting the form of a dog but can change into any form. He is amiable and can become friends with anyone.
He is always smiling and cheerful. He likes making people smile by doing fun things. His hobby is causing mischief.
He is the oldest son of a large family and so has a strong sense of responsibility and a surprisingly sturdy character.

Marius Beaven
Born on September 8th, 180 cm, 67kg
Bishop Class: Restoration Magic. A healing role, can cure any wound or illness.
An amiable gentleman. Perfect self-management.
Is kind to anyone, always gentle with a smile on his face, but keeps a set distance from people.
Does not talk about himself with others, often functions as a counselor.
His personal matters are contained within himself, he is self sufficient.

Victor Rubens
Born on December 24th, 185 cm, 70 kg
Rook Class: Offensive magic. He is also good at physics, so he is strong in battle.
As a Rook, he is often alone. He does not really like fights (but is strong if provoked). 
Likes animals, but for some reason they are afraid of him. Rarely shows his emotions. His family lineage is in the police, so he wants to become like his father and older brother in the future. He especially respects his older brother.

Lloyd Nutley
Born on January 15th, 178 cm, 62 kg
Knight Class: Dark magic. Can incapacitate in one shot, make dangerous potions, and more. Good at any magic.
Likes girls more than anyone. Always has a smile on his face, and always messing around. Always waiting on the Knight Class girls, is kind to them and always making them his partner. Because of this, his reputation with boys is not good. However, even though he is always hanging around girls, he is by no means attached to one person, and likes being single.


▲Shatranj Academy

<Class Dispositions>

★Pawn Class: Specializes in transformation magic, the members of this class are easily carried away and many of them are mischievous.
Cheerful, and enjoys discovering everything.
Usually works in public entertainment related jobs, like performers and the front stage.

★Rook Class: Specializes in offensive magic, members of this class are short tempered. Hot headed students and students with course manners are common. There are also those who are always competing and are quick to fight. Usually works in positions like security or police, that are related to self-defense and guarding.

★Bishop Class: Specializes in restoration magic. There are many gentlemen and ladies in this class. There are many calm and elegant students, with proper manners. Usually works in hospitals or become members of the clergy, positions that are based on healing.

★Knight Class: Specializes in dark magic. Even at Shatranj Academy there are many students whose level towers above the rest. Among the 4 classes, they are the most specialized. Because they specialize in dark magic, they are very mysterious. The students are confident, and many of them are domineering. There are even many people with complex family histories. It is not clear what type of employment they normal.

<Game Function>

★This is a dating simulation game (Otome) you can experience on your
Smart phone.
★The storyline will develop according to your choices in the game.
★The main character (girl) will have the name you input
★You can choose which character you want to have a relationship with
★You will receive a ticket every day for free to enjoy the game further on
★Play mini games (e.g. concentration memory games) and gain magic levels
★2 different missions
   - Increase of magic level will lead you to the next scenario
   - Collecting avatar costumes will lead you to the next scenario

<Avatar Function> 

★Customize your avatar by changing facial features, costumes, and also by decorating your room
★Take a snapshot of your new outfit with your decorated room and share it with your friends to “like” – the number of “likes” you receive will be ranked!
★Enjoy hanging out with your friends by visiting their rooms
★Every play you gain points to play Gacha – You can win new “kawaii” costumes and furniture
★There will be events every month and you will be able to experience a new scenario and a special Gacha

◆Release: 2015, Spring
◆Designed for: Smartphone application（IOS/Android)
◆Language: Japanese/English (Traditional Chinese & Simplified Chinese: Only if we can afford it via stretch goals)
◆DL: Free（In application purchase)


Love! Sushi Rangers -Choose your target (sushi?)!

 

Our protagonist’s father is a pro sushi chef.
In the beginning, a travel agency chose the dad for their planned “High-Class SushiCruising” and then all of a sudden he was taken overseas. That night… our protagonist awoke to a strange voice and saw an unbelievable light. Suddenly 6 youths appeared in the sushi kitchen, looking like people who’ve been seen somewhere before…
In order to help the protagonist, they changed into humans out of being… Sushi toppings!
Thus we raise our curtain on the strange life of a girl and six people(?).Can they help our protagonist hold on to the sushi shop? And what will become of her relationship with them……?!


[Akiko Sugimoto] - KOYON PLETE, CEO
Studied abroad in the US and China. After working for an online game venture company, 2011 October having the goal to share the Japanese Moe culture to women all over the world, and to have as many “Cool Japan” artists success overseas, company KOYONPLETE was created. Using every employee’s experiences overseas, we manage to operate the company using our global eye and language. 

[Mami Ujita] - Scenario Director, Project leader
Studied Game Graphic design at Vantan Game Academy, Japan
She passionately loves Otome game and some sports.

[Haruna Ichikawa] - Scenario Planner, Game Producer
Studied Game Planning at Vantan Game Academy, Japan
She passionately loves Otome game, Johnny's Jr. (Japanese boys idol groups) and fashion nails.

[Hikari Kazenagi] - Illustrator
A Japanese illustrator who has lots of funs all over the world her delicate, soft touch painting. She represents a special brightness universe such as a jewel on her illustration work.

[Risa Takeda] - Illustrator
Studied Character Design at Vantan Game Academy, Japan.
Awarded the first prize of character design.

KOYONPLETE has started uploading a new visual novel application for otomes, pursuing our desire that says, “we want to create the kingdom of dreams and magic for otomes!” With only a few members and only short story scenarios, we were frustrated that we could only come up with applications that would be finished so quickly. Three years after our start up, our number peers with whom we create otome games has grown steadily! We now have an engineering teams, directing teams, and etc. This time, with a team of six, we have now got to a point where we can maintain a cute and game with avatars, capsule-vending, events, and mini-games, a completely new start for KOYONPLETE.
The directing is mainly handled by three girls. The illustration is done by an illustrator who is also active in Pixiv and draws magnificently as if her works were jewelry. They have played extensively every kind of otome game in Japan and will deliver an otome game that is truly enjoyable for the user all over the world.
The setting of the game is an academy of magic. Hasn't everyone wanted to try using magic, casting a staff? The heroine is you. Having extremely strong powers, you can use magic but you know not whether it is light or dark. Within that situation, the heroine will meet wonderful friends and companions, whilst coming face to face with her true self. Your companions are all wonderful boys each with their own unique characteristics, sprouting friendship and love rapidly between you.
The first story that everyone can enjoy, about the length of a paperback, is that of a world of a magnificent magic academy. Within that story you have an avatar that is the image of you, allowing you to decorate and dress up all you want. You can collect magical items as well! It has been made so that the more you play, even if it's free, you can enjoy the game endlessy. Because that's the wish of the three directors of KOYONPLETE. From there on the engineering team will realize an even greater system. Every month new in depth stories and missions, mini-games, gorgeous outfits, and cute magical items will be sent in addition. Cutomize your avatar magnificently. Take snap shots, interact with friends, strengthen your magic, and enjoy new developments with boys you become friends with. You will realize that you had been woven into the grand magical world of light and dark without knowing it.
We are now setting up the Japanese version. We are preparing to upload it by valentine's day next year. We are preparing the English version in tandem, but this requires an amount of translation and localization that KOYONPLETE has never had to do before. We want to enjoy the magic academy with everyone forever. Please let us upload the English version as well. Therefore we are recruiting friends that would enjoy the world of otome with us, please let us KOYONPLETE provide a real otome game to everyone in the world.
And please become our member. Welcome to the kingdom of dreams and magic for otomes! Thank you and please help us take up our cause. 



If you use an Android phone and planning to contribute this perk, please contact us from here -Contact

皆さんはゲームの中の主人公達と恋に落ちたことはありませんかーー？
最近メディアでも話題の「バーチャル恋愛」。
私たち、KOYONPLETEは、世界中の女性がドキドキするようなビジュアルノベルを東京発で提供しております。
前作、"寿司擬人化"をテーマにした"へい！恋愛一丁！"は日本だけでなく、全世界の乙女から大きな反響を呼び、当社のFacebookページは３８万いいねを超える盛り上がりとなりました。当社が開発したビジュアルノベルアプリは累計７００万DLを超え、今後も更なる市場拡大が期待されています。

そして今回、"魔法学園"をテーマにした新作タイトルの開発をさせて頂くことになりました！あなたが魔法学園の生徒のヒロインとなり、学園生活の中で出会い、成長、ロマンスを経験する物語となっています。
今回、クラウドファンディングを通じて当ゲームを多くの方に知って頂き、頂いたご支援は主に開発費・翻訳費として活用させて頂きます。
一人でも多くの方に楽しんで頂けるよう、全力を尽くして参ります。どうぞ宜しくお願い致します。




Allie Quilter/アリー クィルター（名前変更可能）
魔法が得意な一家に生まれたが、大の魔法が苦手。
甘いものを作るのが得意で、少し天然な性格。素直で、でも芯が強い。

Cyril Posford/シリル ポスフォード

8月22日/170cm/58kg
ポーンクラス：変身魔法やパフォーマンス魔法が得意。犬になるのが一番得意だが基本なんでも変身可能。
人懐っこく、誰とでも仲良くなれる。いつも笑顔で明るい。楽しい事が好きで人を笑顔にするのが好き。いたずらが趣味（ロイドやナイトクラスが主：理由は高飛車で自信家が多く、実力はあるのにあまり楽しそうにみえないから）大家族の長男で責任感が強く、意外にしっかり者。

Marius Beaven/マリウス ビーヴァン
9月8日/180cm/67kg

ビショップクラス：回復魔法。ヒールの役目、どんな傷も病気も治せる。
優しく紳士。自己管理は完璧。誰にでも優しく、いつも柔らかい笑顔をしているが、人との距離を一定に保つ。自分の事を相手に話したりしない、基本相談役に回る事が多い。自分の事は自分の中で自己完結派。

Victor Rubens/ヴィクター ルーベンス
12月24日/185cm/70kg
ルーククラス：攻撃魔法。物理も得意で喧嘩は強い。
クールで、一人でいる事が多い。喧嘩はあまり好きではない（でも強いのでふっかけられる。動物が好きだが、なぜか怖がられる。感情をあまり出す事はない。警察家系の家族なので自分も将来は父親や兄のようになりたく、特に兄のことを尊敬している。

Lloyd Nutley/ロイド ナトリー
1月15日/178cm/62kg
ナイトクラス：闇魔法。行動不能にする魔法や、危なめな薬を作ったりなど…魔法はどれも得意。
無類の女の子好き。常に笑顔でいつもチャラチャラしている。ナイトクラス女の子をいつもはべらしている、女の子には優しく誰でも相手にしているため、男子からは評判はよくない。ただ女の子をいつもつれて回っているが、決して一人にしばることもせず、一人でいたがる。

▲シャトランジ学園外観

＜クラス設定＞
★ポーンクラス：変身魔法に特化しており、クラスの仲間もお調子者、悪戯好きも多い。明るく、何事にも楽しみを見いだして行動する。就職先は、芸能関係だったり、パフォーマーだったりと表舞台。

★ルーククラス：攻撃魔法に特化しており、クラスの仲間は短気だったり、熱かったり、気性の粗い生徒が多い。いつも勝負をしたり、喧嘩っぱやい人もいる。就職先は警備や警察などの護衛、自衛関係。>

★ビショップクラス：回復魔法に特化。紳士、淑女が多いクラス。落ち着いた生徒が多く気品も良く礼儀正しい。就職先は、病院や聖職者だったりと基本は癒し専門。

★ナイトクラス：対闇魔法に特化。シャトランジ学園の中でもずば抜けてレベルの高い生徒が多い。4つのクラスの中で一番特殊であり、対闇魔法を専門としているため謎も多い。生徒は自信家、高飛車な生徒が多く、家系自体も複雑な人も多かったりする。就職先は明かされてはいない。

＜ゲーム内機能＞
・主人公の女の子の名前を好きに設定する事ができます
・自分の隠れた魔力を見いだされ魔法の学校にいき、魔力があがります。
・好きなキャラを選んで恋をできます。
・チケットが毎日配布されて無料でゲームを読み進める事ができます
・ミッション2種類。　
　☆魔力があがると次のシナリオがよめます。
☆ アバターの洋服等をあつめると次のシナリオがよめます。
・シナリオの中の選択肢を選択していく事でエンディングが変わります。
・ミニゲーム（神経衰弱等もりだくさん）などで遊ぶと、魔力があがります
・好きなキャラからメールが届きます。

＜アバター機能＞
・自分の好みの顔立ちや着せ替えやお部屋の模様替えができるアバターで遊べます。
・お部屋の模様替えや洋服を着替えたらスナップを取る事ができ、友達といいね！し合う事ができます。いいね！順で順位がつきます！
・お友達のお部屋にいき、自由に交流することができます。
・遊ぶだけでポイントがたまりガチャをまわして可愛い洋服や家具を集める事ができます。
・毎月イベントがあり、あたらしいシナリオとその時だけのガチャをまわすことができます

◆配信言語　日本語/英語/（ストレッチゴール達成時/中国語：繁体語・簡体語）
◆アプリ内課金　基本プレイ無料（アプリ内課金有）

へい！恋愛一丁　〜好きな彼(ネタ？)から召し上がれ！〜

 

プロの寿司職人を父親にもつ主人公。ことの始まりは、父親が、旅行会社が企画した「高級寿司クルージング」に選ばれて急に海外に行ってしまった事。その夜・・・不思議な声で目を覚ました主人公はあり得ない光景を目にする。どこかでみたことのあるような外見の6人の若者が、寿司の調理場に突然現れた。

彼らは主人公を手助けするために人間に姿を変えやってきた、「寿司ネタ」だった！

かくして、少女と６貫（？）との奇妙な生活が幕を上げた。主人公はこの先、お店を守り切ることができるのだろうか？彼らとの関係はどうなってしまうのか―――？！

杉本明子- KOYON PLETE, CEO
米国と中国に留学。オンラインゲームのベンチャー企業での渉外業務を経て、
2011年10月、日本の萌えを自ら世界の女性に向けて発信・感動を共有したい、日本から1人でも多くのクールジャパンのアーティストを世界に羽ばたかせ たいという趣旨のもと、株式会社KOYONPLETEを設立。全社員の海外体験を活かし、グローバルな観点で他言語に運営をしている。

氏田真美 - シナリオ・キャラクター原案、プロジェクトマネージャー
バンタンゲームアカデミー　グラフィッカー専攻卒　
乙女ゲームとアニメとスポーツをこよなく愛する。

市川春菜 - ミニゲーム企画　シナリオ監修　
バンタンゲームアカデミー　プランナー専攻　
乙女ゲームとジャニーズとネイルをこよなく愛する。

風凪ひかり- イラストレーター
光と影をあやつり、宝石のような輝きを再現する、独特の塗りで世界に多くのファンを持つ、イラストレーター。

武田理沙 - イラストレーター
バンタンゲームアカデミー　キャラクターデザイン科卒。
キャラデザイン部門最優秀賞受賞。


KOYONPLETEは「乙女のための夢と魔法の王国を作りたい！」という思いで、乙女のためのビジュアルノベルアプリを 配信してきました。メンバーも少なく、シナリオ量も短編で、すぐ読み終わってしまうアプリしかだせていなかったのが、悔しいところでした。 起業して3年間、一緒に乙女ゲームをつくってくれる仲間がすこしずつ増えてきました！エンジニアやディレクターなど制作チームが出来ました。今回６人のチームでKOYONPLETEにとってはまったくあたらしいスタートとなる、アバターあり、ガチャあり、イベントあり、ミニゲームありのとっても可愛くてすばらしいゲームを運営していく事ができることになりました！ ディレクターはメインで3人の女の子が受け持ちます。イラストはPixivでも活躍する宝石のような色彩が特徴のイラストレータが担当します。日本のありとあらゆる乙女ゲームをやり込んで来た彼女達が ほんとうにユーザーさんに楽しんでもらえる様な乙女ゲームを初めて、世界にむけて発信します。
ゲームの舞台は魔法学園。だれもが杖をふって、魔法を使ってみたいと思った事はないですか？ ヒロインは自分です。すごいパワーがあり、魔法は使えるけれども闇か光か属性がわからない。。そんな中、ヒロインは 魔法学校で、素敵な仲間と会って自分の真の姿を見いだしていきます。その仲間はみな特徴的で素敵な男の子たちで、 恋や友情がどんどんと芽生えていきます。
初めに皆さんに楽しんでもらえるのは単行本１冊くらいの大きなストーリーときらびやかで華やかな魔法学校の世界。その中には自分の分身であるアバターがあるので、自由に着せ替えも遊び放題です。魔法の小物も揃えられます！遊べば遊ぶほど、無料でもどこまでも楽しめるように作ってあります。 それがKOYONPLETEの3人のディレクター達の願いだから。。そこからさらにすばらしいシステムをエンジニアチームが実現してくれます。 一ヶ月毎に読み応えのある追加物語とミッション、ミニゲーム、さらなるゴージャスな洋服やとっても可愛い小物が追加配信されます。 自分のアバターをキラキラに着飾りましょう。 スナップショットをとったり、友達と交流したり、魔法を強化したり、仲良くなった男の子たちとのあたらしい展開をドキドキ楽しみましょう。光と闇の魔法の世界が織りなす壮大な世界にいつしか巻き込まれていることに気付くでしょう。
いまも準備中で、来年のヴァレンタインデーには配信したいと準備していますが、KOYONPLETEではいままでにやったことのないシステムの開発やイラストの量が必要です。そのためには、一定額の資金も必要となってきます。皆さんといっしょに魔法学校を永遠に楽しみたい。そこで一緒に乙女の世界を楽しむ仲間を募集します、KOYONPLETEに本当の乙女ゲームを世界の皆さんに提供させてください。そして私たちのメンバーになってください。乙女のための夢と魔法の王国にようこそ！ よろしくお願い申し上げます。 


ご不明な点、支援・企画に関するご質問などございましたら、日本語で対応しております。お手数ですがこちらよりご連絡をお願い致します。（メーラーが立ち上がります）
問い合わせ




中文 Chinese

衆籌制作，您的募捐來制作乙女遊戲！同時給予您特別的豐厚回報！乙女遊戲《魔法學院》的制作需要您的幫助。 如15000美金募集達成，增加簡體和繁體版本。 制作一款屬于您的遊戲吧！爲捐獻的您解除遊戲中所有支付，更爲您送上豪華周邊。

◆发布时间　２０１５年春季预定
◆发布状态　智能手机App（App Store/Google Play)
◆发布语言　日本語/英語/（众筹达成时/中国語：繁体語・簡体語）
◆游戏内支付　基本游玩免费（游戏内有支付）
◆主题歌　「恋さえずるカナリア」
◆询问

Allie Quilter（名字可更改）
在名门魔法家族出生、却不擅长魔法。
擅长做甜点、有点天然呆的性格。率直、内心坚强。

Cyril Posford

8月22日/170cm/58kg
Pawn Class：擅长变身魔法和特技魔法。擅长变身犬类，但基本什么都会变。
很有人情味、和任何人的关系都很好。时常笑，很阳光。喜欢让自己喜欢的人欢笑。也喜欢恶作剧（以Lloyd和Knight Class为主：理由是高级飞车的自信家很多、有实力却好像不是很开心）作为大家族的长子有责任心、意外的非常认真。

Marius Beaven
9月8日/180cm/67kg

Bishop Class：恢复魔法。牧师的角色、什么伤痕和病都能医治。
优雅的绅士。完美的自我管理。对谁都很温柔、一直保持柔和的微笑、但同时又和人保持一定距离。不和对方说自己的心事、大多都作为倾听者。自己的事情靠自己独断的完美主义者。

Victor Rubens
12月24日/185cm/70kg
Rook Class：攻击魔法。物理方面也很擅长，打架很强。
冷峻、时常一个人。不是很喜欢打架（但因为很强所以时常有人找上门）喜欢动物、但不知为何又很畏惧。不擅长表达自己情感。因为家族是做警察的，自己今后也想像父亲和哥哥一样、特别尊重大哥。

Lloyd Nutley
1月15日/178cm/62kg
Knight Class：暗魔法。让人无法行动的魔法、或者制作危险的药物等…任何魔法都很擅长。喜欢独一无二的女孩。时常保持笑脸。Knight Class的女生一直等候着他、因为对女生很温柔，和谁都能说上话，所以男生对他的评价很不好。
虽然时常和女生在一起、但不会被任何人束缚、喜欢一个人的自由。



＜Class设定＞

★Pawn Class：变身魔法为主、班级中的伙伴们也都是调皮的、很多都喜欢恶作剧。
开朗、任何事情都能找到开心的地方行动起来。毕业后，大多做艺人，或者在魔术舞台。

★Rook Class：攻击魔法为主、班级的伙伴们大多都很急性子、热血、有很多脾气不平和的学生。
时常拼胜负、打架的人也很多。毕业后大多做警察保安、军队等。

★Bishop Class：恢复魔法为主。绅士和淑女很多的班级。学生大多平和有品味，保持高尚的礼仪。
毕业后，大多在医院或神圣职位基本以治疗为主。

★Knight Class：以暗魔法为主。即使在Shatranj 魔法学院中也属于高材生聚集的班级。
在4个班级当中最为特殊、因为专业是暗魔法，所以谜团很多。
学生很多都是高级飞车的自信家、家族关系复杂的人也很多。毕业后的去向不明。


※一部摘錄
story_txt:
◆Japanese page from here日本語◆Chinese page from here中文 (11/5 update!)(These links are only available from PC browser, if you use a smartphone please scroll down.)Have
you ever fallen in love with a video game characterーーー? The word “Virtual
Relationship” has gained attention recently through all sorts of media. Us,
KOYONPLETE offer a visual novel from Tokyo that makes every girl feel“Doki
Doki”. From the previous edition which was themed  “sushi personified” called “Love! Sushi Rangers” was a huge success towards a lot of girls - not only in Japan but also
from all over the world. Our Facebook page gained over 380,000 likes and
achieved 7 million total downloads on our visual novel applications, and we
will continue to further expand towards the success.

This
time, we have decided the theme of our new edition “School of Witchcraft and
Wizardry”! You are the heroine of a student in the school of witchcraft and
wizardry and you will experience all sorts of elements within the school life
including encountering, growing up, and romance. You will be able to enjoy a whole
new system with cool new features - decorate your own room, customize your
avatar’s wardrobe, mini games, and receive messages from your crush/lover. Every month a new
scenario will be updated. Through the method of crowd funding we would like to
have more people to know our game, and every support we receive will be towards
the development and translation costs. We will try our best to have as many people
as possible to enjoy our game. We greatly appreciate all of your support.


Allie Quilter（Available to change the name you input）Born into a family of gifted magicians she is the weakest member.She likes making sweets and is a little spontaneous by nature. She is gentle but strong willed. Cyril PosfordBorn on August 22nd,170cm,58kg
Pawn Class: A gifted shapeshifter with a talent for performance magic.He is best at adopting the form of a dog but can change into any form. He is amiable and can become friends with anyone.
He is always smiling and cheerful. He likes making people smile by doing fun things. His hobby is causing mischief.
He is the oldest son of a large family and so has a strong sense of responsibility and a surprisingly sturdy character.
Marius BeavenBorn on September 8th, 180 cm, 67kg
Bishop Class: Restoration Magic. A healing role, can cure any wound or illness.An amiable gentleman. Perfect self-management.
Is kind to anyone, always gentle with a smile on his face, but keeps a set distance from people.
Does not talk about himself with others, often functions as a counselor.
His personal matters are contained within himself, he is self sufficient.


Victor RubensBorn on December 24th, 185 cm, 70 kgRook Class: Offensive magic. He is also good at physics, so he is strong in battle.As a Rook, he is often alone. He does not really like fights (but is strong if provoked). Likes animals, but for some reason they are afraid of him. Rarely shows his emotions. His family lineage is in the police, so he wants to become like his father and older brother in the future. He especially respects his older brother.

Lloyd NutleyBorn on January
15th, 178 cm, 62 kgKnight
Class: Dark magic. Can incapacitate in one shot, make dangerous potions, and
more. Good at any magic.Likes
girls more than anyone. Always has a smile on his face, and always messing
around. Always
waiting on the Knight Class girls, is kind to them and always making them his
partner. Because of this, his reputation with boys is not good. However, even
though he is always hanging around girls, he is by no means attached to one
person, and likes being single.




▲Shatranj Academy


<Class
Dispositions>
★Pawn
Class: Specializes
in transformation magic, the members of this class are easily carried away and
many of them are mischievous.Cheerful,
and enjoys discovering everything.Usually
works in public entertainment related jobs, like performers and the front
stage.
★Rook
Class: Specializes
in offensive magic, members of this class are short tempered. Hot headed
students and students with course manners are common. There are also those who
are always competing and are quick to fight. Usually
works in positions like security or police, that are related to self-defense
and guarding.
★Bishop
Class: Specializes
in restoration magic. There are many gentlemen and ladies in this class. There
are many calm and elegant students, with proper manners. Usually
works in hospitals or become members of the clergy, positions that are based on
healing.
★Knight
Class: Specializes
in dark magic. Even at Shatranj Academy there are many students whose level
towers above the rest. Among the 4 classes, they are the most specialized.
Because they specialize in dark magic, they are very mysterious. The students
are confident, and many of them are domineering. There are even many people
with complex family histories. It is not clear what type of
employment they normal.

<Game Function>
★This is a dating simulation game (Otome) you can experience on yourSmart phone.★The storyline will develop according to your choices in the game.★The main character (girl) will have the name you input★You can choose which character you want to have a relationship with★You will receive a ticket every day for free to enjoy the game further on★Play mini games (e.g. concentration memory games) and gain magic levels★2 different missions  
- Increase of magic level will lead you to the next scenario  
- Collecting avatar costumes will lead you to the next scenario
<Avatar Function> 

★Customize your avatar by changing facial features, costumes, and also by decorating your room
★Take a snapshot of your new outfit with your decorated room and share it with your friends to “like” – the number of “likes” you receive will be ranked!★Enjoy hanging out with your friends by visiting their rooms★Every play you gain points to play Gacha – You can win new “kawaii” costumes and furniture★There will be events every month and you will be able to experience a new scenario and a special Gacha




◆Release: 2015, Spring◆Designed for: Smartphone application（IOS/Android)◆Language: Japanese/English (Traditional Chinese & Simplified Chinese: Only if we can afford it via stretch goals)◆DL: Free（In application purchase)


Love! Sushi Rangers -Choose your target (sushi?)!
 

Our protagonist’s father is a pro sushi chef.In the beginning, a travel agency chose the dad for their planned “High-Class SushiCruising” and then all of a sudden he was taken overseas. That night… our protagonist awoke to a strange voice and saw an unbelievable light. Suddenly 6 youths appeared in the sushi kitchen, looking like people who’ve been seen somewhere before…In order to help the protagonist, they changed into humans out of being… Sushi toppings!Thus we raise our curtain on the strange life of a girl and six people(?).Can they help our protagonist hold on to the sushi shop? And what will become of her relationship with them……?!

[Akiko Sugimoto] - KOYON PLETE, CEOStudied abroad in the US and China. After working for an online game venture company, 2011 October having the goal to share the Japanese Moe culture to women all over the world, and to have as many “Cool Japan” artists success overseas, company KOYONPLETE was created. Using every employee’s experiences overseas, we manage to operate the company using our global eye and language. 
[Mami Ujita] - Scenario Director, Project leaderStudied Game Graphic design at Vantan Game Academy, JapanShe passionately loves Otome game and some sports.


[Haruna Ichikawa] - Scenario Planner, Game ProducerStudied Game Planning at Vantan Game Academy, JapanShe passionately loves Otome game, Johnny's Jr. (Japanese boys idol groups) and fashion nails.
[Hikari Kazenagi] - IllustratorA Japanese illustrator who has lots of funs all over the world  her delicate, soft touch painting. She represents a special brightness universe such as a jewel on her illustration work.
[Risa Takeda] - IllustratorStudied Character Design at Vantan Game Academy, Japan. Awarded the first prize of character design.


KOYONPLETE has started uploading a new visual novel application for otomes, pursuing our desire that says, “we want to create the kingdom of dreams and magic for otomes!” With only a few members and only short story scenarios, we were frustrated that we could only come up with applications that would be finished so quickly. Three years after our start up, our number peers with whom we create otome games has grown steadily! We now have an engineering teams, directing teams, and etc. This time, with a team of six, we have now got to a point where we can maintain a cute and game with avatars, capsule-vending, events, and mini-games, a completely new start for KOYONPLETE.The directing is mainly handled by three girls. The illustration is done by an illustrator who is also active in Pixiv and draws magnificently as if her works were jewelry. They have played extensively every kind of otome game in Japan and will deliver an otome game that is truly enjoyable for the user all over the world.The setting of the game is an academy of magic. Hasn't everyone wanted to try using magic, casting a staff? The heroine is you. Having extremely strong powers, you can use magic but you know not whether it is light or dark. Within that situation, the heroine will meet wonderful friends and companions, whilst coming face to face with her true self. Your companions are all wonderful boys each with their own unique characteristics, sprouting friendship and love rapidly between you.The first story that everyone can enjoy, about the length of a paperback, is that of a world of a magnificent magic academy. Within that story you have an avatar that is the image of you, allowing you to decorate and dress up all you want. You can collect magical items as well! It has been made so that the more you play, even if it's free, you can enjoy the game endlessy. Because that's the wish of the three directors of KOYONPLETE. From there on the engineering team will realize an even greater system. Every month new in depth stories and missions, mini-games, gorgeous outfits, and cute magical items will be sent in addition. Cutomize your avatar magnificently. Take snap shots, interact with friends, strengthen your magic, and enjoy new developments with boys you become friends with. You will realize that you had been woven into the grand magical world of light and dark without knowing it.We are now setting up the Japanese version. We are preparing to upload it by valentine's day next year. We are preparing the English version in tandem, but this requires an amount of translation and localization that KOYONPLETE has never had to do before. We want to enjoy the magic academy with everyone forever. Please let us upload the English version as well. Therefore we are recruiting friends that would enjoy the world of otome with us, please let us KOYONPLETE provide a real otome game to everyone in the world.And please become our member. Welcome to the kingdom of dreams and magic for otomes! Thank you and please help us take up our cause. 
















If you use an Android phone and planning to contribute this perk, please contact us from here -Contact










日本語 <Japanese>




皆さんはゲームの中の主人公達と恋に落ちたことはありませんかーー？最近メディアでも話題の「バーチャル恋愛」。私たち、KOYONPLETEは、世界中の女性がドキドキするようなビジュアルノベルを東京発で提供しております。前作、"寿司擬人化"をテーマにした"へい！恋愛一丁！"は日本だけでなく、全世界の乙女から大きな反響を呼び、当社のFacebookページは３８万いいねを超える盛り上がりとなりました。当社が開発したビジュアルノベルアプリは累計７００万DLを超え、今後も更なる市場拡大が期待されています。そして今回、"魔法学園"をテーマにした新作タイトルの開発をさせて頂くことになりました！あなたが魔法学園の生徒のヒロインとなり、学園生活の中で出会い、成長、ロマンスを経験する物語となっています。今回、クラウドファンディングを通じて当ゲームを多くの方に知って頂き、頂いたご支援は主に開発費・翻訳費として活用させて頂きます。一人でも多くの方に楽しんで頂けるよう、全力を尽くして参ります。どうぞ宜しくお願い致します。








Allie Quilter/アリー クィルター（名前変更可能）魔法が得意な一家に生まれたが、大の魔法が苦手。甘いものを作るのが得意で、少し天然な性格。素直で、でも芯が強い。

Cyril Posford/シリル ポスフォード8月22日/170cm/58kgポーンクラス：変身魔法やパフォーマンス魔法が得意。犬になるのが一番得意だが基本なんでも変身可能。人懐っこく、誰とでも仲良くなれる。いつも笑顔で明るい。楽しい事が好きで人を笑顔にするのが好き。いたずらが趣味（ロイドやナイトクラスが主：理由は高飛車で自信家が多く、実力はあるのにあまり楽しそうにみえないから）大家族の長男で責任感が強く、意外にしっかり者。

Marius Beaven/マリウス ビーヴァン9月8日/180cm/67kgビショップクラス：回復魔法。ヒールの役目、どんな傷も病気も治せる。優しく紳士。自己管理は完璧。誰にでも優しく、いつも柔らかい笑顔をしているが、人との距離を一定に保つ。自分の事を相手に話したりしない、基本相談役に回る事が多い。自分の事は自分の中で自己完結派。

Victor Rubens/ヴィクター ルーベンス12月24日/185cm/70kgルーククラス：攻撃魔法。物理も得意で喧嘩は強い。クールで、一人でいる事が多い。喧嘩はあまり好きではない（でも強いのでふっかけられる。動物が好きだが、なぜか怖がられる。感情をあまり出す事はない。警察家系の家族なので自分も将来は父親や兄のようになりたく、特に兄のことを尊敬している。
Lloyd Nutley/ロイド ナトリー1月15日/178cm/62kgナイトクラス：闇魔法。行動不能にする魔法や、危なめな薬を作ったりなど…魔法はどれも得意。無類の女の子好き。常に笑顔でいつもチャラチャラしている。ナイトクラス女の子をいつもはべらしている、女の子には優しく誰でも相手にしているため、男子からは評判はよくない。ただ女の子をいつもつれて回っているが、決して一人にしばることもせず、一人でいたがる。





▲シャトランジ学園外観

＜クラス設定＞★ポーンクラス：変身魔法に特化しており、クラスの仲間もお調子者、悪戯好きも多い。明るく、何事にも楽しみを見いだして行動する。就職先は、芸能関係だったり、パフォーマーだったりと表舞台。
★ルーククラス：攻撃魔法に特化しており、クラスの仲間は短気だったり、熱かったり、気性の粗い生徒が多い。いつも勝負をしたり、喧嘩っぱやい人もいる。就職先は警備や警察などの護衛、自衛関係。>
★ビショップクラス：回復魔法に特化。紳士、淑女が多いクラス。落ち着いた生徒が多く気品も良く礼儀正しい。就職先は、病院や聖職者だったりと基本は癒し専門。
★ナイトクラス：対闇魔法に特化。シャトランジ学園の中でもずば抜けてレベルの高い生徒が多い。4つのクラスの中で一番特殊であり、対闇魔法を専門としているため謎も多い。生徒は自信家、高飛車な生徒が多く、家系自体も複雑な人も多かったりする。就職先は明かされてはいない。



＜ゲーム内機能＞・主人公の女の子の名前を好きに設定する事ができます・自分の隠れた魔力を見いだされ魔法の学校にいき、魔力があがります。・好きなキャラを選んで恋をできます。・チケットが毎日配布されて無料でゲームを読み進める事ができます・ミッション2種類。　　☆魔力があがると次のシナリオがよめます。☆ アバターの洋服等をあつめると次のシナリオがよめます。・シナリオの中の選択肢を選択していく事でエンディングが変わります。・ミニゲーム（神経衰弱等もりだくさん）などで遊ぶと、魔力があがります・好きなキャラからメールが届きます。

＜アバター機能＞・自分の好みの顔立ちや着せ替えやお部屋の模様替えができるアバターで遊べます。・お部屋の模様替えや洋服を着替えたらスナップを取る事ができ、友達といいね！し合う事ができます。いいね！順で順位がつきます！・お友達のお部屋にいき、自由に交流することができます。・遊ぶだけでポイントがたまりガチャをまわして可愛い洋服や家具を集める事ができます。・毎月イベントがあり、あたらしいシナリオとその時だけのガチャをまわすことができます



◆配信開始時期　２０１５年春予定
◆配信形態　スマートフォンアプリ（App Store/Google Play)
◆配信言語　日本語/英語/（ストレッチゴール達成時/中国語：繁体語・簡体語）
◆アプリ内課金　基本プレイ無料（アプリ内課金有）◆主題歌　「恋さえずるカナリア」
小池若菜（ボーカル）ピアノ弾き語りのシンガーソングライター、声優、舞台役者として活動中。自身の活動の他、他アーティストへの楽曲提供やコーラ ス参加などの活動も行っている。ブログ http://ameblo.jp/wakana-koike/アーティストページ http://www.south-to-north.net/artists/wakana-koike
佐々木淳一（作詞・作編曲）作詞家、作編曲家としてアーティストへの楽曲提供、アレンジなど精力的に活動中。
こちらからご確認下さい（PDFファイルが開きます）





へい！恋愛一丁　〜好きな彼(ネタ？)から召し上がれ！〜

  
プロの寿司職人を父親にもつ主人公。ことの始まりは、父親が、旅行会社が企画した「高級寿司クルージング」に選ばれて急に海外に行ってしまった事。その夜・・・不思議な声で目を覚ました主人公はあり得ない光景を目にする。どこかでみたことのあるような外見の6人の若者が、寿司の調理場に突然現れた。
彼らは主人公を手助けするために人間に姿を変えやってきた、「寿司ネタ」だった！ 
かくして、少女と６貫（？）との奇妙な生活が幕を上げた。主人公はこの先、お店を守り切ることができるのだろうか？彼らとの関係はどうなってしまうのか―――？！





杉本明子- KOYON PLETE, CEO米国と中国に留学。オンラインゲームのベンチャー企業での渉外業務を経て、
2011年10月、日本の萌えを自ら世界の女性に向けて発信・感動を共有したい、日本から1人でも多くのクールジャパンのアーティストを世界に羽ばたかせ
たいという趣旨のもと、株式会社KOYONPLETEを設立。全社員の海外体験を活かし、グローバルな観点で他言語に運営をしている。氏田真美 - シナリオ・キャラクター原案、プロジェクトマネージャーバンタンゲームアカデミー　グラフィッカー専攻卒　乙女ゲームとアニメとスポーツをこよなく愛する。
市川春菜 - ミニゲーム企画　シナリオ監修　バンタンゲームアカデミー　プランナー専攻　乙女ゲームとジャニーズとネイルをこよなく愛する。



風凪ひかり- イラストレーター光と影をあやつり、宝石のような輝きを再現する、独特の塗りで世界に多くのファンを持つ、イラストレーター。



武田理沙 - イラストレーターバンタンゲームアカデミー　キャラクターデザイン科卒。キャラデザイン部門最優秀賞受賞。




KOYONPLETEは「乙女のための夢と魔法の王国を作りたい！」という思いで、乙女のためのビジュアルノベルアプリを 配信してきました。メンバーも少なく、シナリオ量も短編で、すぐ読み終わってしまうアプリしかだせていなかったのが、悔しいところでした。 起業して3年間、一緒に乙女ゲームをつくってくれる仲間がすこしずつ増えてきました！エンジニアやディレクターなど制作チームが出来ました。今回６人のチームでKOYONPLETEにとってはまったくあたらしいスタートとなる、アバターあり、ガチャあり、イベントあり、ミニゲームありのとっても可愛くてすばらしいゲームを運営していく事ができることになりました！ ディレクターはメインで3人の女の子が受け持ちます。イラストはPixivでも活躍する宝石のような色彩が特徴のイラストレータが担当します。日本のありとあらゆる乙女ゲームをやり込んで来た彼女達が ほんとうにユーザーさんに楽しんでもらえる様な乙女ゲームを初めて、世界にむけて発信します。ゲームの舞台は魔法学園。だれもが杖をふって、魔法を使ってみたいと思った事はないですか？ ヒロインは自分です。すごいパワーがあり、魔法は使えるけれども闇か光か属性がわからない。。そんな中、ヒロインは 魔法学校で、素敵な仲間と会って自分の真の姿を見いだしていきます。その仲間はみな特徴的で素敵な男の子たちで、 恋や友情がどんどんと芽生えていきます。 初めに皆さんに楽しんでもらえるのは単行本１冊くらいの大きなストーリーときらびやかで華やかな魔法学校の世界。その中には自分の分身であるアバターがあるので、自由に着せ替えも遊び放題です。魔法の小物も揃えられます！遊べば遊ぶほど、無料でもどこまでも楽しめるように作ってあります。 それがKOYONPLETEの3人のディレクター達の願いだから。。そこからさらにすばらしいシステムをエンジニアチームが実現してくれます。 一ヶ月毎に読み応えのある追加物語とミッション、ミニゲーム、さらなるゴージャスな洋服やとっても可愛い小物が追加配信されます。 自分のアバターをキラキラに着飾りましょう。 スナップショットをとったり、友達と交流したり、魔法を強化したり、仲良くなった男の子たちとのあたらしい展開をドキドキ楽しみましょう。光と闇の魔法の世界が織りなす壮大な世界にいつしか巻き込まれていることに気付くでしょう。 いまも準備中で、来年のヴァレンタインデーには配信したいと準備していますが、KOYONPLETEではいままでにやったことのないシステムの開発やイラストの量が必要です。そのためには、一定額の資金も必要となってきます。皆さんといっしょに魔法学校を永遠に楽しみたい。そこで一緒に乙女の世界を楽しむ仲間を募集します、KOYONPLETEに本当の乙女ゲームを世界の皆さんに提供させてください。そして私たちのメンバーになってください。乙女のための夢と魔法の王国にようこそ！ よろしくお願い申し上げます。  




















ご不明な点、支援・企画に関するご質問などございましたら、日本語で対応しております。お手数ですがこちらよりご連絡をお願い致します。（メーラーが立ち上がります）
問い合わせ






中文 Chinese

衆籌制作，您的募捐來制作乙女遊戲！同時給予您特別的豐厚回報！乙女遊戲《魔法學院》的制作需要您的幫助。 如15000美金募集達成，增加簡體和繁體版本。 制作一款屬于您的遊戲吧！爲捐獻的您解除遊戲中所有支付，更爲您送上豪華周邊。
◆发布时间　２０１５年春季预定◆发布状态　智能手机App（App Store/Google Play)◆发布语言　日本語/英語/（众筹达成时/中国語：繁体語・簡体語）◆游戏内支付　基本游玩免费（游戏内有支付）◆主题歌　「恋さえずるカナリア」◆询问


Allie Quilter（名字可更改）在名门魔法家族出生、却不擅长魔法。擅长做甜点、有点天然呆的性格。率直、内心坚强。


Cyril Posford8月22日/170cm/58kgPawn Class：擅长变身魔法和特技魔法。擅长变身犬类，但基本什么都会变。很有人情味、和任何人的关系都很好。时常笑，很阳光。喜欢让自己喜欢的人欢笑。也喜欢恶作剧（以Lloyd和Knight Class为主：理由是高级飞车的自信家很多、有实力却好像不是很开心）作为大家族的长子有责任心、意外的非常认真。

Marius Beaven9月8日/180cm/67kgBishop Class：恢复魔法。牧师的角色、什么伤痕和病都能医治。优雅的绅士。完美的自我管理。对谁都很温柔、一直保持柔和的微笑、但同时又和人保持一定距离。不和对方说自己的心事、大多都作为倾听者。自己的事情靠自己独断的完美主义者。

Victor Rubens12月24日/185cm/70kgRook Class：攻击魔法。物理方面也很擅长，打架很强。冷峻、时常一个人。不是很喜欢打架（但因为很强所以时常有人找上门）喜欢动物、但不知为何又很畏惧。不擅长表达自己情感。因为家族是做警察的，自己今后也想像父亲和哥哥一样、特别尊重大哥。
Lloyd Nutley1月15日/178cm/62kgKnight Class：暗魔法。让人无法行动的魔法、或者制作危险的药物等…任何魔法都很擅长。喜欢独一无二的女孩。时常保持笑脸。Knight Class的女生一直等候着他、因为对女生很温柔，和谁都能说上话，所以男生对他的评价很不好。虽然时常和女生在一起、但不会被任何人束缚、喜欢一个人的自由。




＜Class设定＞★Pawn Class：变身魔法为主、班级中的伙伴们也都是调皮的、很多都喜欢恶作剧。开朗、任何事情都能找到开心的地方行动起来。毕业后，大多做艺人，或者在魔术舞台。★Rook Class：攻击魔法为主、班级的伙伴们大多都很急性子、热血、有很多脾气不平和的学生。时常拼胜负、打架的人也很多。毕业后大多做警察保安、军队等。★Bishop Class：恢复魔法为主。绅士和淑女很多的班级。学生大多平和有品味，保持高尚的礼仪。毕业后，大多在医院或神圣职位基本以治疗为主。★Knight Class：以暗魔法为主。即使在Shatranj 魔法学院中也属于高材生聚集的班级。在4个班级当中最为特殊、因为专业是暗魔法，所以谜团很多。学生很多都是高级飞车的自信家、家族关系复杂的人也很多。毕业后的去向不明。


※一部摘錄

story:
What is Noises of the Zone?
Noises of the Zone is a atmospheric and exciting first person shooter inspired by the masterpiece S.T.A.L.K.E.R.

How long has it been in development and who are the developers?
It´s been in development for over a year. The developers are a group of CryEngine enthusiasts mainly from Russia who formerly called themselves "Achieved with CryEngine".
The project gained a lot of attention some time ago and was featured in several gaming and game development websites.

Any plans for the future?
Further developing the game . A big milestone will be the CEV upgrade from the current EaaS version (soemething that the team is working on).


Please help us to get the game alive.


FOLLOW:

YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZ2rRiUi-bOidt...

story:
What is Seedi?

Retro CD Game Console

Insert original CD games and start playing. Seedi makes your old games look great on modern TVs. Use wireless Bluetooth controllers, original system controllers, or almost any USB controller.

Optical Media Player and Burner

Sometimes popping in a DVD or music CD is more convenient and reliable than streaming. Seedi plays your movie and music collection through HDMI. You can also use it as a CD/DVD burner for your laptop or tablet!

The Ultimate Emulator

Seedi runs on open-source software that emulates many of your favorite games and systems.

Home Media Center

Stream online video, Navigate photos and videos stored on your home network, Control with your phone.

 

What's in the box

  1. Seedi system
  2. Seedi vertical stand
  3. Controller (Bluetooth wireless)
  4. Controller charging/pairing cable
  5. Power adapter

    (Included power adapter fits Type A and B wall outlets standard in North America and Japan. Other countries will require a plug adapter. Input: 100-240V AC / Output: 5V3A DC)

 

Background

Seedi breathes new life into the video games that came out in the 90s on CD.

There is something magical about holding that jewel case in your hands, paging through the manual, taking out the disc and putting it in.

The 1990s were a special time when games and technology advanced significantly.
Compact Discs allowed developers to put more content into their games than ever before.

Fast-forward to 2017:
With modern day TVs and aging consoles, you often need to re-buy digital versions of the classics, download backups, fix broken systems, or upscale the video signal...

Seedi takes care of the annoying stuff and let's you get back to collecting, trading, and enjoying the original games.

 

Features

  • Play CD console games!
    • PSX
    • TurboGrafx CD
    • Neo Geo CD
    • Sega CD
  • Play ROMs
    • NES
    • Sega Genesis
    • MAME (arcade)
    • Game Boy (original, color, GBA)
    • Atari 2600
    • TurboGrafx 16
  • Play cartridge games using a Retrode adapter (sold separately)
    • Sega Genesis
    • Game Boy (via separate adapter)
    • Also works as an adapter for Genesis/SNES controllers!

Seedi with Retrode Adapter (sold separately)

  • Multimedia
    • Play DVDs
    • Play media from a NAS
    • Play audio CDs and DVDs
    • YouTube and other add-ons
  • Enhanced gaming:
    • Online multiplayer for some systems
    • Video filters
    • Save state
    • Backup/share saved games
  • Technical specs:
    • 1080p, 720p
    • HDMI
    • Wi-Fi
    • Bluetooth (wireless controllers)
    • Works with various original controllers and USB controllers
    • 32 GB storage (included SD card)
    • Quad-core ARM processor
    • Region free
    • “Open” system (software and hardware)
  • More games!
    • DOS games (for ~386 and below, via CD in DOSBox, smartphone keyboard input)
    • Computer adventure games (via CD in ScummVM)
    • Optimized ports of classic games (Doom, Quake, etc)
  • Case
    • Small form factor
    • Horizontal or vertical orientation
  • Network optical drive:
    • Preserve existing discs (backup to Seedi/computer)
    • CD burner!

 

* Limited Edition Seedi! *

During the 90's there were a few especially timeless designs for special versions of game consoles. In that tradition we are also offering a LIMITED EDITION version of Seedi in old school transparent green plastic! Order while supplies last!

 

Project Status

We started working on Seedi over a year ago in our free time. Since then, it has evolved to the point where we have several functional prototypes and very positive alpha feedback.

We are gamers and engineers that love to tinker and build things, with careers in consumer electronics.

But now we need your help to make this for real!

 

Risks

All projects, including Seedi, have the potential for things to go wrong.

What you see here is a proposal for what we believe can be done - what we have developed, tested, planned for, and know will work. We both have a good bit of experience in product development, but there is still some uncertainty. Specifically, we will be working with all new suppliers and relying on them to follow through with promised lead times and consistency in quality when we begin production. Rest assured that we will absolutely not ship any product that compromises on quality.

*Note to our 12 BETA unit backers: Obviously you will be receiving the earliest software and first-run units - they will not be perfect. We thank you for joining the team in a sense and providing us the feedback we'll need to get everything dialed in before full-scale production! You guys will also be the first to receive the finalized software. 

Finally, there's the matter of legality. We researched this early on and found that relevant lawsuits have historically ruled in our favor (Sony v. Bleem, Sony v. Connectix, Sega v. Accolade) and in fact there are multiple clone consoles that have been on the market for a while (but we'll be the first CD based system!). All software helping to run Seedi is either free open source  or licensed by us for commercial use. 

 

 

 

FAQs

Latest Questions

Do any of the consoles/emulators require a BIOS file to work?

The short answer is yes - most of the CD based systems will require you to copy a BIOS (.bin) file over to the system initially. This can be done easily through the Wi-Fi connection and we will provide simple instructions on how to do this.

We expect that many of you have done this at some point or another using other emulators in the past. Once this step is done, Seedi just works.

One exception to this is for PlayStation, which does not require a BIOS file - however, we recommend adding one for better compatibility.

So, to repeat:

  • PlayStation: BIOS file not required but recommended
  • TurboGrafx CD: BIOS file required
  • Sega CD: BIOS file required
  • Neo Geo CD: BIOS file required
  • All other systems (NES, Genesis, Game Boy, Atari, TurboGrafx-16): Ready to go!

What is a BIOS?

Does Seedi support XYZ console? Why not?

Here is a list of systems not supported:

  • PS2, Xbox, Gamecube
  • Sega Dreamcast/GD-ROMs
  • PSP/UMDs

Various technical and cost limitations prevent us from supporting these systems.
Perhaps Seedi version 2…

Not supported at this time but potentially in the future:

  • SNES
  • Sega Saturn
  • 3DO
  • CD-i
  • PC-FX
  • Amiga CD32
  • Jaguar CD
  • FM Towns Marty
  • Pippin

Is this just a Raspberry Pi? What’s the point?

Seedi does not use Raspberry Pi - but it does use another great processor board, the Orange Pi! Check out this video for more detail. 
The idea behind Seedi is to be a frustration-free way of playing your old CD and other console games on your TV.
We love Raspberry Pi though!

Hardware specs?

Initial specs (may change depending on level of funding):

CPU: Quad-core ARM H3 @ 1.2GHz

RAM: 512 MB DDR3

GPU: Mali400

This system is a performer!

Haven’t I seen that controller before…?

During development we knew the controller would be an essential part of the experience. After researching many different options, we decided to go with a 3rd Party version of the DualShock 3. As many of you know, these 3rd Party, or “P3”, controllers are widely available. It turns out there are MANY different suppliers and versions of them and their quality varies considerably. We evaluated a dozen or more different varieties until we found the right one based on feel, responsiveness, and quality of assembly. We are confident that the model we’ve selected will provide a great gaming experience with Seedi. And for those who have a particular controller they love, no problem! Seedi is available sans controller as well.

Can’t I just do this stuff on my computer?

Certainly, if you want to figure that all out and play on your computer – which we do think is a great way to play!

The idea behind Seedi is to be a frustration-free way of playing your old CD and other console games on your TV.

 

More FAQs

  1. Is this like the NES Classic or SNES Classic? Or a hypothetical “PS1 Classic”?

A: Kind of. The main difference is that Seedi does not come with any games, and that it can actually play your original CD games with the built-in optical drive.

  1. Does Seedi come with any games?

A: No - bring your own! :)

  1. For CD games, do I need to wait for the game to be copied to the system before playing?

A: No! Seedi can read games from the disc on the fly, so they can be played immediately.

  1. Does Seedi work with multi-disc games?

A: Yes!

  1. What controllers can I use?

A: A bunch! Seedi has Bluetooth built in, and we recommend wireless controllers.
The controllers that come with Seedi are similar to PS3 controllers.
However you can hook up your own wired Xbox 360 controllers, etc. with a USB hub.

  1. Can I use a wired PS1 controller?

A: Yes! We have tested out many PSX-USB adapters and they work great.

  1. How many controllers can I connect?

A: You can hook up 8 controllers.

  1. How will keyboard & mouse input work for DOS?

A: You can map the mouse and keys to your gamepad, use our phone app as a keyboard, or even hook up a real mouse and keyboard (wired or Bluetooth!)

  1. How do I copy over ROMs/files?

A: The system has built-in WiFi. Connect Seedi to your home network, and it will appear as a shared drive folder.

  1. Can I play my cartridge games?

A: Yes, with the addition of a Retrode adapter.
You can separately purchase a Retrode adapter device and plug it into Seedi.
The Retrode has 2 slots, Sega Genesis and SNES (SNES is not currently supported by Seedi), and also has ports to plug in Genesis/SNES controllers.
Just insert your Genesis cartridge and Seedi will detect it and start up your game!
There are also additional adapters for Retrode to work with Game Boy and more.
Retrode can be purchased here: https://www.dragonbox.de/en/183-cart-reader

  1. What ports are there for expansion?

A: Seedi has one USB “OTG” port, and it comes with an adapter to plug in normal USB peripherals. To plug in multiple devices you can use a USB hub!

  1. Can I play imported games?

A: Yes!

  1. Can I play DVDs from different regions?

A: Yes!

  1. How well can I expect games to play?

A: Emulation is not always perfect, and we accept that.
Take a look at this breakdown for how we classify compatibility:
Key:
“Fantastic” - 95% of games work without any issues
“Good” - 80% of games work without issues

  • PlayStation
    • with BIOS - fantastic
    • without BIOS - good
  • Sega CD - fantastic (requires BIOS)
  • TurboGrafx CD - fantastic (requires BIOS)
  • Neo Geo CD - fantastic (requires BIOS)
  • NES - fantastic
  • Sega Genesis - fantastic
  • Game Boy - fantastic
  • Atari 2600 - fantastic
  • Neo Geo - fantastic
  • TurboGrafx - fantastic
  • PC adventure games - see https://www.scummvm.org/compatibility/
  • DOS - Games requiring a 386 processor or below should run fine
  1. How does game saving work?

A: Your game progress is saved to the main SD card. You can use traditional built-in saves, or emulator “save anywhere” - your choice.

  1. What setup will be required?

A: You will be up and running in no time.
-Plug the system into TV and power
-Pair the included controller(s) (first time only)
-Connect to WiFi
-Copy over any game files you want to play
*For CD based systems you must also provide a BIOS file (simple instructions included)
-Have fun!

  1. What does the button on Seedi do?

A: The default behavior will be to set the system to sleep, and wake it back up.

  1. What open source projects does this use?

A: Front-end/media player: Kodi
Emulators: Various. Please read this article for the full list.
OS: Linux
CD emulation: Seedi (will be open source upon launch)

  1. Is this an official product by/licensed by Sony/Sega/etc.?

A: No.

  1. Does it support the PS1 multitap?

A: Unfortunately no. If you want to use a bunch of PS1 controllers, what you can do though is use a USB hub with multiple PS1-USB adapters.

  1. Can I use my PS1 memory card?

A: No. Seedi uses a virtual memory card. It is possible though to copy PS1 save files onto the virtual memory card.

  1. How does Seedi make my games look good on my TV?

A: Old TVs and game systems had various analog properties that resulted in a blurred picture, which made them look great, and they were designed for this environment.
When you hook up your classic systems to high-definition TVs they lose a lot of these effects and end up looking weird/bad. Seedi uses a few techniques (enabled by default) to automatically correct these issues so that games look like they were supposed to.

  1. How should I place Seedi in my room?

A: Seedi can sit flat, or you can use the included stand to hold it vertically (either on the left side or right side). Just make sure to give it a little air to ventilate.

  1. Can I also listen to music with Seedi?

A: Sure, just pop in an audio CD or DVD-Audio disc. You can also stream audio files from a NAS or other source.

  1. What output resolutions are supported?

A: 720p, 1080p

  1. How much storage space does Seedi have?

A: There are 32 GBs, so you should have plenty of space to store files locally. You could also use your own SD card instead, or plug in a USB drive.

  1. Is Seedi based on FPGA hardware?

A: No. We have found that good old emulation is just fine :)

  1. Is the Seedi hardware locked down (“Tivo-ized”) at all?

A: No! You can repurpose the hardware for anything you want. And you can reinstall the Seedi package as well.

  1. What's with the name?

A: Phonetically it sounds like “CD” - the medium that changed the game. It also represents the seed that was planted with this wave of games in the 90s.

  1. Who are these guys?

A: Chris is a mechanical engineer who grew up playing NES with his mom.
Bryan is a software engineer who grew up playing DOS games.
Together we have 20 years of industry experience in consumer electronics and design.

 

 

 

 

Work in progress disclaimer

All preview photos/screenshots/etc on this page represent our goals for the final product - not the final product itself. Seedi is still in development so changes may be made.

Open Source Compliance

Seedi is predominantly powered by a collection of free open source software. We have selected programs that are licensed explicitly allowing sale/redistribution (such as GPL). When Seedi ships, this code and our modifications will be made publicly available according to their licenses. To learn more please read our statment here.

ROM/BIOS files

A "ROM" is a digital backup of a console game (which can normally only be run on the system it was originally designed for). A "BIOS" file is a digital copy of the operating system software from a gaming system. The legality of using ROMs/BIOS files depends on the laws in your country and/or other conditions like owning an original copy of the game and/or the original hardware it ran on.
