story:
The TCGs Revolution

Lifecycle is a game we have been designing for over a year with the sole purpose of eliminating the bad sides of trading card games. And we are proud to say that it has succeeded in that!

 

What's worse than drawing a plain or a garnet on your last turn? Well, having a bad hand from the beginning! The one real bad side of most TCGs is the luck factor that always plays a huge part in determining your games. But in Lifecycle, it's gone for good!

Lifecycle enables you to order your deck before coming to the match, leaving luck completely out of the equation.

At the same time, lifecycle has a brilliant play system that prevents players from gaining too much of an advantage, while preserving the fun and soul of the game. In fact, this system results in a much deeper experience.

This feature makes Lifecycle the perfect place for competitive TCG players, the ones who are never satisfied when luck gets to play for them.

In addition to this, and to eliminate any luck left from matchmaking, players will get a chance to reorder their deck after seeing their opponent's main card, the Homeland.

 

 

How many times have you gone to grab a cup of coffee because your opponent was taking 5 minutes on every turn? This will almost never happen in Lifecycle! And this is because of our innovative lead-system.

An ‘action’ is any move you do in the game, except certain special moves.

The lead-system will not only drastically reduce the time you spend waiting to play, but will also add huge depth to the game! Since the lead-system allows only two actions for each player before giving the lead to the other, the timing and order of your actions are suddenly crucial, game-changing decisions!

Let’s explain with an example: if you wanted to play two cards that buff your unit and then attack, your opponent will get the lead after your second card, because it's your second action. Similarly, you won't get the lead until they perform two actions. So, if you wanted to attack this "lead", you'll have to play one card and then attack immediately. Or perhaps you'd rather play one and pass, leaving the second buff for your next lead to surprise your opponent with a huge attack, but at the risk of getting a blocker in your face.

We can go on and on about the possibilities to manage your actions in different ways, but we hope you have gotten a glimpse of the depth Lifecycle has to offer. But did you think this was it? Wait until you see how this depth multiplies after getting introduced to the complete game's design!

 

Lifecycle also presents a golden card to rule everything, the "Homeland". It's the first card to pick, and the one that determines your success. Your Homeland will not only determine which cards you can put in your deck, but also empowers you with a continuous ability ready from the first turn!

The continues ability will be your core mechanic, and the heart of your combo. Since it is active from the beginning of the game, all you have to do is gather the pieces to build your ultimate deck!

The homeland card also has locked abilities that unlock when you have the right level of power, adding another dimension to turns and action timing.

These reasons make each homeland extremely unique. Each new homeland released will open new doors to new strategies.

 

Our game is FREE TO PLAY, and we mean it!

The free daily login bonus is 2 PACKS! Every day!

How do you get packs in Lifecycle exactly?

Simple: just play the game! Players will get a pack whenever they level up (again, just from playing!) and through special events and tournaments. Our business model doesn't depend on selling packs; instead, it depends on other items like pre-built decks, cosmetics, and coins.

 

Our in-game market will enable you to buy and sell cards to and from other players.

 

A tradable card is a card that you can sell on the market or buy from other players.

To make cards from a pack tradable, you must spend a coin while opening that pack. Then these cards can be traded on the market. If you choose not to spend a coin and to open the pack for free, the cards you get will be untradable, and can’t be sold.

Tradable and untradable cards play the same; the only difference is that you can't sell untradable cards. The drop rate of cards doesn't change; either you used a coin, or you didn’t.

If you're a free player, don't worry! You can still go Free Forever and open all your packs for free. If you love our game, the least we can do is to let you enjoy it as much as you want!

The open beta is scheduled for May 2020 on PC only and will be free to play. We also have plans for other platforms. Why are we releasing the game so early? Well, development is almost complete. However, we still have a long way to go with illustrations and certain artistic aspects. This is why we have started a campaign on Indiegogo; to gather more support and finalize the game, and to change the TCGs we love for the better.

All rewards will be from the first set unless stated otherwise.

All cards obtained from these rewards are tradable.

Coins have been explained above, in the "tradable cards" section. Please note that each pack will contain 5 cards.

Collections are special-art copies (promos) of certain cards. Each collection will have four promo cards in addition to the cards in the previous tiers. Example: The Platinum collection includes its cards in addition to the cards of the Gold and Silver collections, for a total of 12 cards.

  • Silver Legends collection: Retzo, Ketvig, Haluk, Battle of Jahsh.
  • Gold Legends collection: Larzo, Hareld, Ulvi, Jao.
  • Platinum Legends collection: Genzo. Thuk. Tulughan. Manta.
    A maximum of 510 copies of each of these promos will ever be distributed.
  • Diamond Legends collection: The "Chapter" cards. Which are four powerful and extremely flexible cards. A maximum of 10 copies of each of these promo chapters will ever be distributed, own one of those ten!

The "Backer of light" and "Backer of shadow" avatars. They are exclusively for the backers of the project and can never be obtained later by other means.

A tour deck is built to be a tournament-ready deck. It is a collection of 31 cards, including one Homeland and one other Mythic card. It includes many rare cards as well. We built these decks to be both beginner-friendly and competitive at the same time.

A package of cosmetics that mainly represent some Homeland. It contains an avatar, sleeves, mat, plate, and a deck box.

In the first set, there will be 8 Homelands. 4 of them can be obtained in tour decks, while the other 4 are only found in packs. This reward will give you a copy of each of the Homelands only found in packs. With that, you will have all of the Homelands from the first set!

Cosmetics that are exclusive for the backers on this site. They can never be obtained later by other means.

 You will receive an avatar for a unit you choose from the first two sets, and sleeves for a card you choose from the first two sets.

With the help of our R&D team, you will design 4 cards within the first 8 sets (excluding the first two). The cards will carry your name by writing "Designed by [your name]" at the bottom of the card. You'll receive an exclusive avatar for each unit and receive sleeves for each card you designed. Of course, you will also receive 2 copies of each card once its set is released.

 

 

Thank you for your interest in our campaign!

(All in-game or card designs in this campaign are not final, so please don't consider them as such. Most of them might get major enhancements.)

story:
T H E  G A M E :

Shadowlines™ is a First Person Shooter style physics-based, block-breaker game. (Try to say that three times fast!) What that means is, you get to shoot various objects with a number of different projectiles. Each projectile has it’s own ability and effects on different objects. The main objective of the game is to kill all the enemies on the screen, destroy as many objects as possible, in as few shots as you can. At the successful completion of each level your score will be added up and a Gold, Silver or Bronze medal will be awarded.  There are also several skill testing achievements to unlock as well as Game Center compatibility. Beat your friend’s high score! Unlock more skill testing achievements! All in 60 + levels of addicting block smashing, bad guy exploding fun!

 

W H A T  M A K E S  S H A D O W L I N E S™  D I F F E R E N T ?


W E A P O N  O F  C H O I C E : What makes Shadowlines™ different from other similar style games is the ability to choose your projectile (bullet). Other games force you to use what is next in line. With Shadowlines™ you have the ability to choose which one you would like to fire! Develop your own strategy and plan your shot carefully! Remember, the main objective is to kill all enemies and cause as much damage in the LEAST number of shots! 

F . P . S   &   H O R R I Z O N A T A L   G A M E  P L A Y :

The game is mainly in First Person Shooter style however, there are projectiles that have the ability to move horizontally (left and right). What does that really mean? It means a more diverse and fun style of game play! Not only do you get to strategically choose your shot but you also have to decide whether it is best to blast your target straight on, or from the side. This mix of game play creates an almost endless number of possibilities and outcomes!  

MAKING WAVES IN THE COMIC INDUSTRY ! 

Shadowlines™ is not only an great fun & addicting game BUT it is also a professionally made comic book series! It is available both in-store (Retailers available online) and on our website! Debuting at Wizard World Toronto this past April, here is what some industry professionals and reviewers had to say about the comic:

_________________________________________________________________

“This is probably the most well developed thing I’ve seen in a long time.”

-Ken Lashley, DC artist

_________________________________________________________________

“Great work, I recommend for everybody (to read). These guys are the future of comics.”

-Mike Deodato, Marvel artist

_________________________________________________________________

“Shadowlines has proved it can be a top notch story that will only get better.”

-Mike Parente, ComicAttack.net

_________________________________________________________________

 

.... Updates Coming Soon!! ....

story:
"Mechapocalypse" is a proposed development directorate from the existing players of the Massively-Multiplayer Online Roleplaying Game "Divergence: Online" currently for sale on Steam and running live 24/7 in Early Access.

Divergence: Online is an MMO unlike any other of today in it's focus on "big" features. Initially, this was designed around the necessity for not just a huge 16x16km open world consisting of 5 biomes, islands, and continents, but our revolutionary crafting and housing systems with features above and beyond anything even major developers are attempting today. When released to Steam Greenlight is won the #1 position out over more than 1,700 games.

Resources and resource locations are dynamic with varying qualities producing better or worse crafted items based on these stats. In lay-man's terms, Better materials make stronger mechs.

Another aspect of Divergence: Online is it's selection of totally unique playable species, including diminutive tribal lizards, cyborg alien ninjas, 5-breeds of humans and even artificial intelligence. AI or "synthetics" exist with no permanent body to call their own and instead traverse the world transferring their consciousness from  one "chassis" to the next, some as small as humans, others as large as a house, or even what are commonly known today as "Mech"s.

Although currently only synthetics can "dominate" mechs (AKA Military Synthetic Chassis) in Divergence: Online, it's always been our goal to add several Mecha which are in fact both dominatable by synthetics but also able to be piloted by one or more humanoid pilots and passengers.

When we released our latest large content update for Divergence: Online which saw the addition of the very first pilotable vehicles in the game, our players immediately began postulating about "If only there were Mecha in the game that you could pilot like the airships and new vehicles". Many people speculated about how much fun it would be to "get into big mech vs mech fights in the desert over resources and cities".

Operating as a small dev team with meager income, core game features must take priority, however so many players voiced their willingness to "fund" such a venture that we decided to go ahead and throw up a crowdsourcing campaign to give those players a shot at making that happen sooner rather than later.

Additionally, a small influx of funds would not only allow us to develop Mecha in Divergence: Online "ahead of schedule" but also give us the breathing room to knock out some other features integral to these which would otherwise be a part of that process.

Our current funding tree looks like this:

$5,000

  1. Two new Mech-Style Chassis' pilotable by humanoids, designed and implemented into the game in record time, voted on by our players.
  2. Current Synthetics weapons fully-integrated at last. (Chainsaw arm & H.A.R.R.D Cannon for "Rudeboy" and Vulcan Cannon & Extended-Range Rail Rifle for BMP)
  3. BMP Military Synthetic pilotable by humanoids.

$7,000 +

  1. One additional new Military Synthetic Chassis (Mech) designed and implemented for every $2,000 raised.
  2. Theta-Blade attacks finalization and implementation.
  3. Mech external weapons usable by passengers (Be a gunner!)

To reach these goals, we've decided to go ahead and sell some of our new vehicles up-front to aspiring players at a reduced rate from our current online store, as well as offer "gold-level perks" from previous campaigns as well.

The best part is that if the campaign is not successful, you won't pay a dime, so thanks for your interest in our project both old friends and new!

story:
Our page on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetai...

Let us introduce you a game Overlord Trouble – game based on jRPG genre.

  • Gripping story, branching dialogue system, interactive, rich world with a huge number of different quests and more!
  • Unique combat system based on the “Monstyle” system.
  • A huge variety of classes, improvements, "Monstyle " system- create your character the way you want to see it!
  • A lively and diverse world, based on the Unity engine
  • 2D-cute graphics, animated characters

 

World of Overlord Trouble – is a fictional universe by name of Veltiona, where two fractions: Humans and Monsters live together in peace and harmony. But a very long time ago these two races had waged long lasting and murderous war among themselves.

Many people and monsters had died, each of warring fractions lost many lives. Veltiona was falling deep into the darkness

Nevertheless leaders of the two conflicting parties found forces to put an end to it and Veltiona found hope for peaceful existence.

Still not everyone liked the current situation. In depth, in the most remote and dark places arose something that intended to destroy this young and fragile peace.

You are going to be a representative of generation of Monsters which knew about war only according to stories of the ancestors. As the fates decree, you will have to face your destiny - to save and preserve the peace from the Evil that had shrouded Veltiona …

Overlord Trouble is a representative of classic RPG therefore all mechanics of a game are constructed typically; but there are a number of unique differences which are making game different from the others.

Monstyle is a unique ability of Monsters, however not all of them know how to use it. Your hero is one of those who inherited this style. Each various class of the monsters who have this ability has it's own techniques for use in the monstyle.

Monstyle includes system of the special attacks (specials) for conducting tactical fight. This style allows you to carry out one or a series of blows. You can choose from the specials which are present to your character, distribute them on levels of execution and carrying out the attack.

The choice of the required action

Filling of the executable actions

The use of this style requires an increased concentration. Drawing specials in monstyle mode is implemented by pressing a hotkeys; at the same time, player should show a good concentration and high endurance. If the performance went successfully damage to the enemy will be huge, in case of a mistake (interruption of a combination), damage will be small.

Demonstration of a monstyle system

Hero level up system has a branched system of selection of classes. At the initial stage you have three available upgrades: elemental of water, lizard and brownie.

The menu of improvements will be available by achieving the required number of points. A certain quantity of points is spent for each new branch of development.

Demonstration of class selection

Each class has it's own unique ability. For example, elemental of water belongs to the class of water beings. Therefore, its special techniques (skills) will belong to "water" magics.

Preservation of a point of development is possible. For this purpose there is an option “I Will Stay As Myself”.  And at any moment you can improve your character, by spending a point of improvement in the menu of a profile.

Class development menu of a character

If funded, Overlord Trouble will be released on Windows / Mac / Linux. Demo version of game will be released on Windows and Linux.

Our gratitude. Your name will be mentioned in credits.

All of the above + Digital copy of a game.

All of the above + early concepts of a game.

All of the above + exclusive game themed wallpapers..

All of the above + physical copy of a game.

All of the above + stickers with a game logo.

All of the above + stickers with characters of a game.

All of the above + the game NPS drawn according to your drawing and descriptions.

 

All of the above, except NPC + the game monster drawn according to your drawing and descriptions.

All of the above + your surname or a logo of your organization in initial credits, as sponsor.

 

Why Indiegogo? This crowdfunding platform is a good start for small, creative and ambitious projects. Therefore we chose Indiegogo.

Our team works on the project without cease for nearly a year. For release of the game and for sale realization we need funds. We believe that people in Indiegogo, have similar dreams like us, who wanted to become a game developer since the childhood. Allow us to fulfill our and your dream, so together we could achieve more great objectives!

 

Risks and challenges

This game for us is the first big project; before we worked with small and mobile games. Of course, development of a game is really difficult task especially because our team is young. However we consider that we have a sufficient experience to conduct our project to a perfect shape. Even if our campaign in Indiegogo will not be crowned with due success, we want to assure you: a game will be completed and released.

Pirojkov Vladimir - game designer, artist. Was introduced to the world of 2d games after getting his access to the internet for the first time. JRPG's were first of those games. After that moment he always wanted to participate in creation of a game.

Alexander Mekumyanov - programmer. Was working in a game industry for quite a time. Participated in several startups. His favourite types of games are strategies and games that require deep thinking.

Alexey Stepanov - programmer, worked at game industry for several years. Wanted to create his dream game ever since he saw Heroes of Might & Magic III: with awe he witnessed how two older kids were playing it until he was chased away from computer.

Aisen Prokopyev - Editor. Maybe he doesn't like to code, but he sure likes to play games. He got his first PC at age of 10 and his first game was Max Payne. He liked to play games ever since then.

Veltiona was falling deep into the darknessNevertheless leaders of the two conflicting parties found forces to put an end to it and Veltiona found hope for peaceful existence.Still not everyone liked the current situation. In depth, in the most remote and dark places arose something that intended to destroy this young and fragile peace.You are going to be a representative of generation of Monsters which knew about war only according to stories of the ancestors. As the fates decree, you will have to face your destiny - to save and preserve the peace from the Evil that had shrouded Veltiona …Overlord Trouble is a representative of classic RPG therefore all mechanics of a game are constructed typically; but there are a number of unique differences which are making game different from the others.Monstyle is a unique ability of Monsters, however not all of them know how to use it. Your hero is one of those who inherited this style. Each various class of the monsters who have this ability has it's own techniques for use in the monstyle.Monstyle includes system of the special attacks (specials) for conducting tactical fight. This style allows you to carry out one or a series of blows. You can choose from the specials which are present to your character, distribute them on levels of execution and carrying out the attack.The choice of the required actionFilling of the executable actionsThe use of this style requires an increased concentration. Drawing specials in monstyle mode is implemented by pressing a hotkeys; at the same time, player should show a good concentration and high endurance. If the performance went successfully damage to the enemy will be huge, in case of a mistake (interruption of a combination), damage will be small.Demonstration of a monstyle systemHero level up system has a branched system of selection of classes. At the initial stage you have three available upgrades: elemental of water, lizard and brownie.The menu of improvements will be available by achieving the required number of points. A certain quantity of points is spent for each new branch of development.Demonstration of class selectionEach class has it's own unique ability. For example, elemental of water belongs to the class of water beings. Therefore, its special techniques (skills) will belong to "water" magics.Preservation of a point of development is possible. For this purpose there is an option “I Will Stay As Myself”.  And at any moment you can improve your character, by spending a point of improvement in the menu of a profile.Class development menu of a characterIf funded, Overlord Trouble will be released on Windows / Mac / Linux. Demo version of game will be released on Windows and Linux.Our gratitude. Your name will be mentioned in credits.All of the above + Digital copy of a game.All of the above + early concepts of a game.All of the above + exclusive game themed wallpapers..All of the above + physical copy of a game.All of the above + stickers with a game logo.All of the above + stickers with characters of a game.All of the above + the game NPS drawn according to your drawing and descriptions. All of the above, except NPC + the game monster drawn according to your drawing and descriptions.All of the above + your surname or a logo of your organization in initial credits, as sponsor. Why Indiegogo? This crowdfunding platform is a good start for small, creative and ambitious projects. Therefore we chose Indiegogo.Our team works on the project without cease for nearly a year. For release of the game and for sale realization we need funds. We believe that people in Indiegogo, have similar dreams like us, who wanted to become a game developer since the childhood. Allow us to fulfill our and your dream, so together we could achieve more great objectives! Risks and challengesThis game for us is the first big project; before we worked with small and mobile games. Of course, development of a game is really difficult task especially because our team is young. However we consider that we have a sufficient experience to conduct our project to a perfect shape. Even if our campaign in Indiegogo will not be crowned with due success, we want to assure you: a game will be completed and released.Pirojkov Vladimir - game designer, artist. Was introduced to the world of 2d games after getting his access to the internet for the first time. JRPG's were first of those games. After that moment he always wanted to participate in creation of a game.Alexander Mekumyanov - programmer. Was working in a game industry for quite a time. Participated in several startups. His favourite types of games are strategies and games that require deep thinking.Alexey Stepanov - programmer, worked at game industry for several years. Wanted to create his dream game ever since he saw Heroes of Might & Magic III: with awe he witnessed how two older kids were playing it until he was chased away from computer.Aisen Prokopyev - Editor. Maybe he doesn't like to code, but he sure likes to play games. He got his first PC at age of 10 and his first game was Max Payne. He liked to play games ever since then.

story:
Get your friends and discover our product

- 7 days trial -

 https://dartsmaniacs.com

 

What is DartsManiacs?

DartsManiacs  is a web platform enabling anyone to instantly play darts with anyone else in the world while offering a real venue feel.

How is this possible? Our system allows users to see their opponent and their opponent's dartboard simultaneously due to our novel use of data streaming technologies and user interface options.

Long story short, this platform will act as the world’s largest arena. Challenge anyone, anytime, anywhere in the world for a game, from the comfort of your home or from your favorite pub, requiring only a laptop, an external webcam, internet and an account on our platform.

Users get to stick with their real dartboard  and preferred darts while DartsManiacs covers the broadcast and all the rest.

If both players are DartsManiacs users, starting a game can be done as fast and as easy as 3 mouse clicks. Travel time now becomes more playing time, and expenses become congratulatory drinks.

Play more in a fast and simple way. More games mean more experience.

Practice becomes interactive while playing with old friends or new ones, wherever they are. Meet new people  and build communities.  Anything can start with a game of darts. :)

This is a brief introduction into what we have experienced so far with DartsManiacs, however, there is much more to come.

DartsManiacs is currently under development, but we hope our ideas have sparked your interest to join us in building something extraordinary.

We, the developers, would like to have the chance of taking this project further. We would like to implement all the features we have planned and want to make this the go-to place for all darts players.

 

Why Indiegogo?

One of  our biggest goals is to find all the people who are as excited as us about this project. We want to make sure we are building the right product for them.

We brought DartsManiacs as far as we could with our own resources and effort. We managed so far to invest time and work into this project in our free time, outside our daily jobs.

By holding this campaign, we hope we’ll raise funds for getting this project further in a more professional way and deliver it faster to the Darts World.  In order to make it as awesome as we want it to be, we now need to focus on this project full time. That includes bringing  full-time staff on board.

The minimum founding target will allow us to have a full time team which will bring into the stage a Beta version and afterwards a fully functional product which will act as the largest darts arena in the world with all the necessary features for 1v1 games and 99.9% video availability.

Unfortunately, developing the platform and keeping it running in a  polished way is very expensive. All the funds raised from this campaign will go into further development and the costs of maintaining the platform (infrastructure costs – operating costs).

We  are a small group of people who managed, in about two years, with our own resources to bring this project so far. With this campaign, we would like to raise funds to finalize the first stage of this project and take it  to the next level.  Our goal is  to find people who share our enthusiasm and want to be part of the movement.

 

DartsManiacs vision

This idea came out of passion for Darts and technology from a few senior software developers and an amateur darts  player. We were wishing to make the distances disappear in the world of darts and give users  an opportunity to play more, despite geographical constraints. DartsManiacs is the product of our combined efforts on weeknight evenings and weekends.

We started asking ourselves, what if we could create a highly performant web platform which will break the distance barriers enabling players to play anyone else, across any distance, from any place with a dartboard, only requiring web cameras and internet connection?

What if you could play a game  and enjoy the real venue feel from your office, your home or your favorite pub with someone from another country or continent?  Where else can users play with friends, or develop new friendships based on their love of the game?

What if we could build a go-to place for any darts player offering great features, which will transform this platform into the biggest darts arena ever?

We have the answer to the first part of the question: yes, we have proven to ourselves that we can build it. The second part of the question is related to you, the darts players. We are very enthusiastic about the project, but the final purpose of it is to serve and to complete the Darts World,  for the Darts players.

What if a few developers create an Indiegogo campaign asking for support from people who  share their enthusiasm while working  to make the product available to everyone. What if we would find those enthusiastic people to help us accelerate the development and make it available for everyone faster?

We are here at the final step, if you like our idea and would like to be a part of it, we could really use your help to make it happen. Don’t get me wrong, it will still happen, but not that fast. If the goal of the campaign will be reached, we will be able to launch a beta version in about 3 months, maybe even faster. We will use the funds to help our developers focus full time on the project, not just part-time, which will speed things up a lot.

Once this project reaches a stable operational level, our wish is to invest back into grass root darts by offering support to darts players and darts events all over the world.

 

DartsManiacs features

We wanted to create the world’s largest darts arena.  With our own resources, we have managed to build and to bring to the forefront a first version which for now supports 1v1 X01 Darts games with 2 video streams for each player.  Players are currently able to:

  • See the opponent and the opponent's Dartboard at all times. Using two webcams at the same time for each player creates a real venue feel.
  • Perform a quick system setup: point one webcam to your throwing position (if you have a laptop this will be the laptop’s webcam), fix the second webcam at the dartboard’s level (maybe with a tripod), create an account on our platform and off you go ! You're ready to have fun.
  • You can setup your webcams position before starting the game or during the match 
  • Find and add your friends who already use the platform
  • Choose your opponents (friends or filter online users on their averages, location);
  • Play anyone in the world.
  • Everything is built focused on getting into a match as fast as possible. 
  • 2 game modes -  Statistics ON ( game statistics will be recorded by the platform for that game) - Statistics OFF ( game statistics will not be recorded by the platform for that game, useful for your warm up matches. 

 

 

  • Get into a Match with 3 mouse clicks. More matches, more practice

 

 

  • Easy match configuration

 

  • Predictive score pad to prevent entering erroneous scores. If you still made a mistake and entered the wrong score, do not worry, you can still edit it, but we will notify your opponent about that.
  • No time to finish the match with your friend? No problem. Leave the match open until the next time you can play. We will keep the match exactly at the point where you left it (legs and score).  That is very useful if you refresh the page by mistake or if your internet or electricity goes off. It also happened to us during the development.  But now, no worries, we've got your back ☺
  • Live statistics during the game

 

 

  • Monitor your growth with professional statistics instantly updated after each match. If you are passionate about statistics you have many things to study over there (including evolution charts).

 

 

  • See your real time rankings between your friends, in your city, in your country and worldwide.
  • Chat to your friends on the platform
  • Build your customized profile
  • See other players' profiles and statistics
  • Receive real time notifications for game invites, friend requests and chat messages 
  • Manage your friends an compare your statistics with them

 

 

  • View your game history: see who you played against and every match’s statistics for you and your opponent

 

 

  • See real time status indicators for users: online, offline, in-game .

The system was built with a modern design capable of scaling out to support hundreds of thousands or millions of games at the same time (that`s why we call it the biggest darts arena ☺).

 Our recommendation: Try it on big screen TV :) You will have a great experience.

 

What you need to use the platform

  • A computer with internet connection. Use only Google Chrome or Opera as your web browser!

  • A suitable internet connection will support watching a YouTube video.

  • A player account on our website.

  • Two web cameras: one of them will be pointing at the dartboard and the other at your throwing position. If using a laptop, one of the two cameras can be the laptop's integrated camera. A mechanism that will keep the second webcam steady, pointing at the dartboard. We recommend a tripod.

P.S. we recommend  having two webcams for the best experience on our platform, but it works just fine with one camera also ;)

 

 

Technical specifications

We won’t bore you with much technical stuff, but based on the platform requirements (to be fast, and scalable for millions of users, video availability close to 100%, no down time to the site during further development and to be also user friendly) we had to create an architecture capable to sustain everything in the most robust way. To achieve that, we used the latest and the most flexible technologies which complied with the software architecture requirements.

Because we want our platform to offer the features enlisted before to every player in the world we have to use a cloud server system for the application and a third party global media server service. The media server will ensure the big rate of video availability but these come with serious costs.

 

Future plans for this project

We have long term plans in our mind for this project. Like we have already said, we want to build the go-to place for any darts player. Having that in mind, if our campaign is successful, we will be able to launch in a short period of time a fully 1v1 functionality.

Afterwards, we will focus on building leagues and championships and lots of surprising features  surrounding that. ☺

Next, we will be approaching team vs. team functionality. We will build this feature in such a way that will offer great excitement  to every player. This will also imply lots of statistics for the team as a whole and for each player within the team.

Remember, this is only a high level image. The most interesting parts will be in the details of the implementation.

Also take into consideration the fact that everything we build is going to be video streaming driven. ☺

We didn't add any stretch goals because providing a precise forecast for development implies a big amount of time consumed.  For now, we have chosen to  focus on development. What we can assure you is if our campaign rises more than the goal listed, the rest of that amount will go into building the next features that we have in plan and also the ones that you might want on this platform.

 

Risks and challenges

At this point from the development point of view, we managed to cover all of the main challenges that could cause major risks. Of course we are talking about software development and we are aware of the fact that many challenges will arise in the future. We have managed to resolve all the main blocking threads which could have stopped us from bringing this project  this far.

We’re already at an Alpha stage so we have the basic functionality in place (the campaign video is made using our current version).

We know it works, we have had lots of fun with it already During the development process, we played with our friends all around the world.  DartsManiacs does not require the latest generation of computers. Any computer that can run a google chrome browser and has an internet connection capable of streaming a YouTube video or Skype call will do the job. The rest is handled by our server infrastructure. 

Our team’s experience helps us to have a clear vision on what comes next and what we will need  to budget for:

●      Continuing the development for the first step and get it ready for a global beta launch 

●      Finalizing the QA process so we can eliminate as many bugs as possible

●      Add new functionalities, improve the current ones based on the feedback

●      Support the operational costs

One main advantage is that when the product will be launched, you will get instant access to it. In our case, the shipment  delivers an email to notify you that we are up and running. So we can say that we will have a very fast shipping ☺

 

How everything started

The idea for DartsManiacs arose from a simple discussion amongst friends.

It was a simple idea, a worldwide arena for darts players to play in real-time with other online users. Afterwards we started building around  this idea and very  quickly we saw new horizons.

We immediately realized we could build something that will provide great support in playing darts in a comfortable and interactive way worldwide. Offering darts players an innovative place where they could practice with their friends or with other players will enhance the level of the competition, and will also have a good impact on the player`s self development. Playing more, with more opponents, builds the player's experience.  

That was the moment when we switched from “let’s build it for fun” to “let’s build it in the most professional way to move the Darts game to the next level”. We started to think about the functionalities that will push everything to a higher level.  From a simple idea, we ended up with a complete development plan for a project that will revolutionize the way the game of Darts is played and the people`s experience while playing it. Seeing how big and complete this project will be, our enthusiasm was growing.

We established the main characteristics that the application will have: to be very fast, to be scalable to millions of users, to be user-friendly and to be innovative (this is how the idea of using 2 webcams at the same time arose, to offer a real venue feel).

Taking into consideration the fact that everybody had daily jobs, we needed a bigger team to push the project forward. That`s how we built a strong team which overcame all the challenges. The entire team worked for 2 years in their spare time managing to build the project in  our own way. The time spent working on DartsManiacs surfaced problems which  challenged every team  member to evolve both professionally and personally.

Though challenging, the journey has been insightful and worth the effort.

 

The team

●      We are 7 web developers with varying  experience levels(6 to 14 years experience) and an experienced darts player. Our daily jobs involve developing software for big corporations.  

●      We didn't work on high profile titles but we were involved in building world-class technology.

●      Besides development, we have project management and management skills.

●      Our experience covers every part of this project.

We would like to thank our friends who helped us in this journey whenever possible.

 

 

Ways You can Help

Back our campaign!

By backing our campaign it means we have found someone who is as enthusiastic as we are in combining technology and the game of Darts, offering the ultimate fun experience and lots of features that will help Darts players improve their skills.

Back our campaign and be a part of the movement. Let's push darts into the 21st century and be part of the rEvolution of Darts.

 

Share our campaign!

Share our campaign with your friends on your social media channels or groups.

Suggest new features!

Suggesting new features that could be added to the system to enhance the playing experience.

Give us your feedback!

If you need more information about this project, you can contact us on email at contact@dartsmaniacs.com.

That`s how we built a strong team which overcame all the challenges. The entire team worked for 2 years in their spare time managing to build the project in  our own way. The time spent working on DartsManiacs surfaced problems which  challenged every team  member to evolve both professionally and personally.Though challenging, the journey has been insightful and worth the effort. The team●      We are 7 web developers with varying  experience levels(6 to 14 years experience) and an experienced darts player. Our daily jobs involve developing software for big corporations.  ●      We didn't work on high profile titles but we were involved in building world-class technology.●      Besides development, we have project management and management skills.●      Our experience covers every part of this project.We would like to thank our friends who helped us in this journey whenever possible.  Ways You can HelpBack our campaign!By backing our campaign it means we have found someone who is as enthusiastic as we are in combining technology and the game of Darts, offering the ultimate fun experience and lots of features that will help Darts players improve their skills.Back our campaign and be a part of the movement. Let's push darts into the 21st century and be part of the rEvolution of Darts. Share our campaign!Share our campaign with your friends on your social media channels or groups.Suggest new features!Suggesting new features that could be added to the system to enhance the playing experience.Give us your feedback!If you need more information about this project, you can contact us on email at contact@dartsmaniacs.com.

story:
Pillow Fight is the prime release of a multiplayer first person shooter in real life!
Nothing before came this close to a true FPS.

Our goal is to transfer the experience of modern first person shooters directly into the real world. With great high-tech electronics and for a price that everybody can afford!


As we don't want anybody to shoot each other with real bullets, we use the latest hi-tech infrared-laser system. Harmless to the eyes, yet with great accuracy. This allows us to give every weapon its own specifications.

These will be the first two guns available:

Also all our guns will be packed with everything needed to make them look and feel incredibly realistic:

To make sure that every hit counts, we are using hit-indicating combat-vests which will include head-sensors for accurate skill shots.

These vests not only look good but alert you, that you have been hit via sound, light and vibration, built into the vest. Also, this allows you to see that you successfully hit an enemy player, by the LEDs on their vest and of course by the sound you will hear from the speakers within your vest.

What we really need to achieve the true FPS-experience using a Heads Up Display (HUD) for every player.

For the HUD we came up with the most clear and simple solution:

We use your smartphone!

Regardless what smartphone and operating system you use (iOS, Android, WindowsPhone) you will be able to play Pillow Fight, as we are developing a universal app for everybody. And of course the download will be for free!

So our App will not only pair your guns and your equipment, but also give you the possibility to use every feature you are familiar with from state-of-the-art multiplayer shooter games.

As you can see, we designed a one-size-fits-all wristband which not only gives you the freedom to have your HUD always available, but also protects your smartphone with a display protection which still allows you to navigate the app.

If you know how a multiplayer first person shooter works, you already know how Pillow Fight will work!

Depending on the game mode you are playing, you will be able to fight against each other, or team up with friends to kick some enemy team's butts.

So... it's basically the same as playing your multiplayer shooter games on your console or your pc, but in this case you are running around in the real world, with your guns and equipment, showing your true aiming and team-player skills.

Every player has their setup:

One or two guns, the vest, the headband, the wristband and a smartphone (required!) running the Pillow Fight app

You will be able to pair your gear with your app. This allows you to define different player-classes and also your gear to only work with your respective Gamer-ID.

We then thought about what game-modes you, as gamers, might like to play.

So, we are happy to confirm the following game-modes will be available in Pillow Fight right from the start:

  • Deathmatch
  • Team-Deathmatch
  • Multi Team-Deathmatch
  • Domination
  • Duel
  • Mexican Standoff

That is just the beginning. We can't wait to hear your suggestions for new game modes!

One of your biggest concerns surely is: "Will I always have people to play with?"

We thought about this question a lot and we found some great solutions, by making it easy as 123 and to make sure you will always find Pillow Fighters nearby:

Think of Pillow Fight not only as a game, think of it as a new kind of sports. You could even form an association!

As we love pimping our guns to the maximum, as much as you do, we clearly decided to give you the possibility to put attachments onto your guns. Our first three attachments will be available at the time of the launch, if we reach the specific Stretch Goals. Remember, these are only the first attachments, we want to produce. There will be much more great stuff to put onto your guns. As well, since you are an important part of the team, you will be able to tell us what you want us to develop.

The Red Dot Sight helps you to improve your aiming. It will be fully adjustable, so it will be up to you on what distance you will calibrate it.

If you want your gun to make less noise and don't want to appear on the enemy radar, you might want to use the silencer.

The Grip lowers the recoil effect of you gun, specially while using assault rifles with a huge recoil, this attachment is really helpful.


We designed every attachment to fit onto every weapon. In this way, you will have the freedom to customize your guns fitting with your preferred method of play.

The connections we will use, will be all standardized so you will not only be able to let the gun know which attachment you put on, but also supply attachments like the red dot sight or the tactical light with energy.

We were not lying when we told you that Pillow Fight will have every feature you are already familiar with in modern multiplayer shooters. This means that the players progress is a very important feature of the gameplay as well.

We divided the progress into two parts.

As we want Pillow Fight to evolve and improve over many years, it makes no sense to give players experience points to level up in ranks. What we created instead are what we call Experience Coins (XC). 

With these Coins you will be able to purchase Player Items and unlock KillStreaks. However, this will be just the beginning. Once the Pillow Fight Community (PFC) grows large enough we will offer more and more ways to spend your XC. We want the PFC to be a very important part of the development, so that you will be able to share your ideas on this topic also.

Every successful action in the game will give you XC. Here are just some of the many ways to earn XC:

In order to unlock Weapon Extras which will improve your guns, you have to earn Experience Points (XP) with the respective gun. 

You can earn XP in a similar way to XC. Some examples:

Note that there are more to follow!

With your XC you are able to purchase Player Items. Some of them will have a specific count of usages per match. Once you have decided to use a Player Item in a match it is spent.

Here are some of the Player Items, that will be available at the launch:

While your gun is earning XP, you will level it up rank by rank. Every new rank unlocks a new Weapon Extra, which you are then able to choose for your gun.

Here are some of the Weapon Extras, that will be available at launch:

If you manage to eliminate several enemies in a row, you will get a KillStreak. You are already familiar with this type of gameplay!

In order to be able to choose which KillStreaks you want to take with you in a match, you have to unlock them with your XC.

Here are some of the KillStreaks which will be available at the launch:

In our teaser trailer we told you that the whole world will be your map. So you might want to know, how that will work, don't you?

Whenever you set up a game lobby with your friends, you are able to draw borders to create a map out of the place you are currently located in:

You can even select the Respawn-Positions:

There will be many other options, so please stay tuned.

After creating a map... you can name it, select different criteria (like "dangerous at night") AND even save it.

In this way you can use this map each and every time you return at this location, without having to fill out all the details again.

And most importantly: On the Pillow Fight homepage, you can see every map created. This is done so you can find out where in your area there may be maps to play on, which were found by other players

There, you will be able to rate maps, discuss them or even suggest improvements.

We want Pillow Fight to be a great way to get deeper into the FPS-experience, but we also want it to be a completely new and fun activity. As you know, not everybody likes people are playing first person shooters.

So we decided to show a small difference, large enough to be not mistaken, but small enough to deliver the right feeling for the player. 

To protect the hi-tech electronics which are inside each product, we will be using a carbon-like plastic skeleton. This skeleton will then be further protected by hard foam material.

The outer surface will be made of a smooth plush (soft fur-like) with unique and trademarked stylish patterns along with stark black embroidery-style stitching for our comic-like outlines.

If anybody is asking you: "Why you are running around with soft toy weapons?", you are always able to say: „We are just having a little Pillow Fight.“ Smart, hey!!?  

You might want to know if there are any differences between playing a first person shooter on your pc or console OR in real life with Pillow Fight.

We'd love to show you those differences: 

As you can see, you will not only have great fun with Pillow Fight, but you will also be doing something for your health. You never expected that from a first person shooter, did you?

First of all, you should know that all rewards will reach you one month before the product officially hits the stores. So there is a lot of time to level up before the rest of the world does. Important: Every reward includes worldwide shipping!

To make this even better, we decided to give all Indiegogo Backers one month of double XP for their guns!


So here are the rewards:

You will get access to the Pillow Fight Community (PFC) homepage as soon as it is online, so you can save your Gamer-ID and edit your profile way before everybody else is able to do so. This reward is included in every other reward!

This sweet pillow looks exactly like its functional brother, but is only stuffed with foam. You can play around with it, throw it around and hug the rounds out of it!

The "Sidearm" Starter Kit includes our first sidearm PLUS the vest (incl. headband) AND the wristband. Everything you need to get yourself right into combat.

The "Assault" Starter Kit includes our first assault rifle PLUS the vest (incl. headband) AND the wristband. Everything you need to get yourself right into combat.

The "One Man Army" Starter Kit includes our first assault rifle AND sidearm PLUS the vest (incl. headband) AND the wristband. With this Starter Kit you are able to switch guns instead of reloading. A great advantage for serious players.

The Two Man Army reward includes 2 "One Man Army" Starter Kits.

To show your friendship a little love, both of you will get the player item "Helpful Hand" three times and unlock the KillStreak "Backup" immediately.

The "Limited Edition One Man Army" Starter Kit includes our first assault rifle AND sidearm PLUS the vest (incl. headband) AND the wristband.

In this special edition you will receive a limited edition standard assault rifle and sidearm. Both will be coming to you in a unique design, which will be made exclusively for our Indiegogo campaign, with real gold threads and velvet instead of plush. These guns will be each limited to a total of 99 items, all numbered.

The Clan Pack includes six "One Man Army" Starter Kits.

To show you that we support clans right from the beginning, you will get them at this special price. Also you will get the chance to register your clan-name and clan-tag throughout the early access to the Pillow Fight website.

Time to get famous! If you choose to take this reward, you can send us a picture of your face, which will be illustrated by our graphic designer Ralf Bremer and put on every package of all Pillow Fight Starter Kits. An option for you is to tell us if tell us, if you want us to put your Gamer-ID under your picture.

You will also get a Limited Edition "One Man Army" Starter Kit.

You will get the chance to meet the crazy guys behind Pillow Fight and party with them all night! It's all on us! (including travel and accommodation)

We are planning on having the Pillow Fight Launch Party in May 2014 in Atlanta, GA. 

You will also get a Limited Edition "One Man Army" Starter Kit. Bring it with you and the team will sign it for you!

For those of you who want us to bring even more stuff onto the market, right from the beginning, here are our Stretch Goals.
Note: All of these items will be available as rewards as soon as their Stretch Goals are reached!

If we reach this goal, we will design and develop this, a perfect place to secure your sidearm. So when you are reaching to change weapons, you don't have to put them into your pockets. Also we will design and develop the Lanyard for rifles and shotguns, so when you are going to change weapons, you don't have to put your weapon under your arm.

If we reach this goal, we will design and develop the Gun-Grip attachment. To see how the Gun-Grip works, take a look at our section about the attachments. 


If we will this goal, we will design and develop the Silencer attachment. To see how the Silencer works, take a look at our section about the attachments.


If we reach this goal, we will design and develop the Red Dot Sight attachment. To see how the Red Dot Sight works, take a look at our section about the attachments.


If we reach this goal, we will design and develop a complete new weapon. The choice is up to you! We will build a survey, where all backers will vote and help us to decide which weapon it will be. Once the decision is made, you can inform us if you want to have this new weapon instead of your standard assault rifle. If you don't like the choice, it's up to you. If you would like to have the standard assault rifle in you "Assault" or "One Man Army" Starter Kit, that's fine too.


We told you that we want you to team up in clans. However, what really proves how well a clan plays together is via a great tournament, where all of you can boast how much you got. 

We are planning to arrange a huge tournament, where clans are able to fight for real prizes, but we are also going to build a real life replica of your favorite map from a video game (decided by majority vote). Once again, you can participate in a great survey, where we find out on which map you want to teach other clans a lesson.

Can you imagine playing Pillow Fight on a map, you already know from one of your video games? Yes, WOW!

So if you want to turn the next summer into one of the most amazing summers of all time, you might want us to reach the highest amount possible. Read on further down below so we can tell you what you can do to help us to achieve this and of course the success of the project itself.



When we came up with the idea of Pillow Fight, one of the most important things for us was the community-aspect. We knew that we are only able to make a great project if we are going to listen what the players want.

We are now listening to you! So YOU will be an important part of our project, right from the beginning. So we will start here and now, to allow you to be part of this exclusive team. The surveys you complete will help us make important and vital decisions before the campaign is over.

First of all we make sure, that we can proceed with our development and secondly, we will have to produce your rewards and to enable to let you to play Pillow Fight soon as possible.

To create a complex game like Pillow Fight, and still keep the price as low as possible for the players, we have to put a lot of money into its development. As we have already shown above, Pillow Fight will be a high-end valued product, with state-of-the-art electronics and materials. We want your gear to last for many years and give you the confidence that they will give you hundreds of hours of fun in the future.

By helping us to make this happen, you are not only making sure that this incredible gamers-dream is going to be reality. You REALLY are helping us to develop a high-end product affordable for everybody. 

Obviously every Dollar counts, but that's not everything you can do to help us make this dream come true. Please tell your friends about Pillow Fight and share the link to THIS campaign through your social networks so that many others are able to find out about our project.

Visit our website www.playpillowfight.com and use social media spread the word:


  


If you have any questions regarding our Pillow Fight project,
feel free to contact us. 

We'd love to hear from you!



Risks and challenges

Immediately after we achieve our goals, we will continue on with our development. There will be so much more work to do, especially, when we reach all of our respective stretch goals. As we are working with such a great team to develop the Pillow Fight project, we are very confident that everything will happen on time. As you are aware, we are aiming for a product launch in May 2014 (N.B. ‘April’ for you backers). We have already completed a tremendous amount of research and development, so we are extremely confident of completing the whole project on budget and time. This is even allowing for contingencies if the unexpected should happen.  We are really looking forward to working closely with the online and Indiegogo community, to evolve and improve Pillow Fight. On the upside, we will keep you updated about every advance and new development that we will make. We believe in an open and transparent development and working environment, especially for our supporters.

You REALLY are helping us to develop a high-end product affordable for everybody. Obviously every Dollar counts, but that's not everything you can do to help us make this dream come true. Please tell your friends about Pillow Fight and share the link to THIS campaign through your social networks so that many others are able to find out about our project.Visit our website www.playpillowfight.com and use social media spread the word:  If you have any questions regarding our Pillow Fight project,feel free to contact us. We'd love to hear from you!
Risks and challengesImmediately after we achieve our goals, we will continue on with our development. There will be so much more work to do, especially, when we reach all of our respective stretch goals. As we are working with such a great team to develop the Pillow Fight project, we are very confident that everything will happen on time. As you are aware, we are aiming for a product launch in May 2014 (N.B. ‘April’ for you backers). We have already completed a tremendous amount of research and development, so we are extremely confident of completing the whole project on budget and time. This is even allowing for contingencies if the unexpected should happen.  We are really looking forward to working closely with the online and Indiegogo community, to evolve and improve Pillow Fight. On the upside, we will keep you updated about every advance and new development that we will make. We believe in an open and transparent development and working environment, especially for our supporters.

story:
You want to participate in this project because:
- we are a strong company with highly experienced stuff that has released the first part of the game (http://store.steampowered.com/app/489360/agecheck)
- we really like our game and we offer you an unique chance to become a part of this great project. You will be able to keep a close watch on the project development through our developers' diaries.
-with your help, this project can be successful and attractive for all. We need you to create the breathtaking multiplayer by which you and your friends can get an unforgettable experince. 

We need your help to implement all our ideas quickly and with a good quality. All the money raised will be used to create the unique multiplayer. How many horror games with a multiplayer do you know? Well, what about horror games with animatronics? That is what we said, too! Which is why we need you to help us! All the money will go to rent servers for the multiplayer and to pay our stuff salaries. 

If you decide to participate in this campaign, you should understand the following things:
- Your role in this project is much wider than just a support of the game. We are going to create a history together with you!

- You are a part of the team that has created the project in this Universe («Case animatronics»).

http://store.steampowered.com/app/489360/agecheck - as a program participant, you will have the first access to the game and you can take a part in testing of the multiplayer together with our specialists.

Well, sure, all projects have some elements of risk and our project is no exception. If we can't raise enough money, we will have to hold off on the multiplayer's release, that is why your participation is essential to realize the multiplayer and rent servers. 

Even if you can't help us financially, we will be very grateful to you if you share the link on our project and tell your friends about it.

story:
Origins

Three life-long friends from Italy, combining their skills and making their very first app.

We all come from different fields, such as Fine Arts, Political Science and Computer Engineering. We came up with this idea during our Phase 1 of quarantine. We had already gone through other smaller projects but this time we wanted to combine our skills and make the app we always wanted. It had to be something simple that could entertain us and our friends, despite the distance between.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Wolf Run is a mobile game project in which you play the role of a wolf in the woods of Canada.
Avoid the obstacles along the way in order to get as far as possible and challenge your friends.
It may look simple, but don’t be thrown, because timing is key.

 

REACHING OUR GOAL WILL ALLOW US TO:

  • Publish the App on the Play Store
  • Publish the App on the App Store
  • Add A Customization Menu
  • Add New Scenarios
  • Buy the Fonts we need
  • Produce an exclusive OST
  • Develop an Ad Campaign
     

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute, there's still a way you can help:

  • Follow our Instagram @wolfrunofficial
  • Share our project with your friends


Stay tuned for more info. 
That's it for now.
Ci vediamo presto!

story:
Arcane Worlds is a remake / re-imagining of the classic Magic Carpet game. It's a first person shooter, but instead of running you fly, and instead of guns you have an array of spells which are powerful enough to change the game world beyond recognition.

To use those spells, especially the more powerful ones, you need mana which is gathered from the world and stored in your castle. Enemy creatures and sorcerers will try to hamper the gathering and claim the mana for themselves, so there are some tactics involved too.

And to get new spells you'll explore multiple worlds, solve some puzzles and discover the stories of various people after the Dark Tide Calamity which happened several centuries ago. You'll be able to affect those people, helping or harming them, making choices that will define your story, goals and the ending of the game.

The game is currently in alpha, and already on Steam Early Access and the free demo is available on my site and Steam.

The demo has a small universe and less spells than the current alpha, but it'll give you a fairly good idea of what the game is now and how it runs on your computer.

It's Windows-only for now, but it was reported to work fine under Wine on Linux too.

Already in alpha

Dynamic worlds - The magic is powerful and you can use it to reshape the worlds, building or destroying, placing volcanoes and chasms, guard towers and walls, raising islands out of the sea and more.

Water and lava simulation - Create and redirect streams. Raise volcanoes or stop lava flows. Drain water to discover what's hidden beneath it. Breach a mountain lake to flood a town. Use all that and more to reach your goals or just for fun.

Swarms of creatures - Massive battles with powerful spells. Summon armies or fight those summoned by your adversaries. Fight the remnants of the Dark Tide. (Note: no "summon an army" spell in alpha for now.)

Procedurally generated content - While a lot of the stories, worlds and gameplay elements are designed and scripted, the exact way they appear in the game is generated semi-randomly each time you start a new game. So the universe will be different on each play-through, and you will encounter things you never saw before.

Will be in complete game

Multi-player - While not yet in alpha, several multi-player modes will be added later. Both co-op and PvP, but limited to all players being in one world at a time. The story mode will be single-player only.

Huge boss enemies - Mighty Dark Abominations will be procedurally generated by the game, essentially assembling them from a large variety of parts. You'll need special tactics and sometimes certain spells to defeat them. They will travel between worlds, like you do, and change them.

Dynamic universe in story mode - There are many worlds to explore and you can choose the way you do it. As you progress, various events will happen in the universe, triggered by you or other wizards, consequences of your actions or clashing of other characters.

Rune magic - Multi-part spells which require you to put the runes on the ground, arranged in the right pattern. That'll allow you to carefully place and time the effect of the spell. Some of the patterns will channel very powerful magic. Some will allow you to do things not possible otherwise. Some will change the way you play if you choose to use them regularly and will eventually bring you to a specific ending. And you can experiment by changing the runes you use in the pattern to discover new magics.

Sandbox mode - Experiment with magic without any limitations. Share the worlds you create.

Modding support - Using the same tools the story mode is created with, make your own stories, or add various elements to the game, like creatures, places, world features, puzzles and more. Steam Workshop support will be added for mods.

Linux and Mac ports - The game is Windows-only for now, but I'd like to port it to Linux and Mac too. Of course, you'll get those versions for free if you already own the game, just like other updates.

My name is Alexey Volynskov, and I make almost everything in Arcane Worlds, except music and some sounds.

I was a technical director and co-founder of Gaijin Entertainment. I did a lot of stuff, designed and developed several major versions of the in-house engine, and contributed to many projects in various ways. A lot of my work went into X-Blades. But because of the health issues, I sold my share and left the company.

I was still recovering when I started working on Arcane Worlds in 2011, and it went really slow at first. I'm fine now, I moved to Bulgaria where the climate and the food are much better for my health. The game was Greenlit, and while I ran out of my savings, Steam sales allowed me to work on Arcane Worlds full-time.

Unfortunately, the Early Access sales are quite low now, and not enough to fund the development up to the release. I can get a part-time job to pay the bills, but that'll seriously slow down the development, and I'll have to cut a lot from the game too.

Getting funding from a publisher or an investor is an option too, but crowd-funding is better since it's less limiting creatively, so I'd like to try IndieGoGo first.

I won't abandon Arcane Worlds, even if the IndieGoGo campaign won't reach its goal. I really want to create a Magic Carpet remake and expand on it, and I owe it to the people who already trusted me by purchasing the game on Early Access. So here I am, asking for your help to let me finish the game, and hopefully, make it great.

The amount I'm asking for is the minimum to finish the game. It'll be smaller than I'd like it to be, I'll have to cut corners and add some less significant features post-release, but it'll be a complete game with a story and several endings.

Most of the money, after taxes and campaign-related expenses, will go to paying my bills (rent, food etc.) while I work on the game for about a year. I already have the software to make the game, so there's no need to purchase anything else.

If I get more than I'm asking for, I'll expand the game, so it'll take longer to finish, but it'll be much better. I might also do some features (like multi-player and Linux/Mac ports) earlier.

Each tier includes the rewards from all previous tiers. Note that some tiers have multiple rewards.

The game

You'll get an unique download link on my site which you'll be able to use to download the current alpha and all future updates, up to and including the release. Also, on the same page there'll be Steam and Desura keys you can use if you prefer to get the game on those portals.

Your name in credits

Your name will be added to the special section of the game credits. I'll contact you to ask what name you'd like to use for that.

Soundtrack

On game release (when all music will be made, polished etc.) you'll get a high-quality digital copy of the soundtrack. Both in lossless high-quality FLAC and more commonly-used MP3 formats.

Name something in the game universe

The game universe is procedurally generated each time you start a new game. Things that have names like, for example, towns will have dedicated name pools from which the names will be randomly selected. So any particular name isn't guaranteed to appear for you when you start a new game, but eventually it will, and many people who play the game will see it too.

Please keep the names appropriate. It's a (mostly) fantasy-themed game, so not all names will fit. I'm sure we'll be able to work it out together.

Let's take a look at what you can name if you choose the appropriate perks:

  • A town. There'll be various settlements in the game, some flourishing, some long abandoned and in ruins, and they'll have names: written on stones, mentioned by characters and used in stories to discover as you play.
  • A tribe or nation. Some savages might be unnamed, but more advanced tribes and civilized nations will have names. You'll be able to interact with them in various ways, and they'll drive stories. Some ancient nations will be long gone, leaving only ruins filled with their writing and secrets.
  • A "boss" creature. There'll be huge weird powerful Dark creatures called Abominations. They won't talk, but tribes which encountered them will name them and tell you about them.  Another option is Dark Titans, the old wizards who merged with the Dark Tide, either trying to deal with it, or seeking power for themselves. They'll be similar to Abominations, huge Dark creatures but with some human-like elements, and they'll talk to you, and will be involved in some stories.
  • A wizard. If you select this perk, in addition to the one of the above, you'll be able to name a wizard character. The same pool of names rule apply, so the name might not appear in every play-through. But the wizard characters are more unique, you'll encounter them many times in different worlds and they might become your allies or enemies. In addition to the name, you can specify some personal traits for the wizard - I'll consider them when adding that wizard to the game, but I don't guarantee to follow them exactly.

Design a new spell, creature or world

You can choose one thing to design, and be as specific (or not) with your idea as you wish. I'll talk to you to figure out what you want and implement it in the game. For example, you can say "I want a fiery tornado spell", or "I want a creature like that mythical one (link to the picture)". Or you can describe it in more details: how it should work, how it should interact with other stuff in the game - it's up to you.

Note that I might adjust it so it fits in the game and is not under- or overpowered. The thing you designed will be in each generated universe, but might be missed in any particular play-through if the player skips some worlds, for example.

Your name and the thing you designed will be put into the special section of the game credits, separate from the others.

You can choose one of these:

  • A spell. It'll be subject to the common game mechanics in the matter of discovering or making it and casting it, but you can design what it does and name it. Note that it might be used by NPC wizards too, against the player or someone else.
  • A creature. It can be an enemy, a peaceful critter, or something else. You can design how it looks, how it behaves etc. You can also specify if you want players to use it as a mana gatherer or not.
  • A world. This one is more tricky. It can be just some unique-looking world. Or it can be a world with some kind of puzzle. Or it can be a small story, as long as it takes place in one world. It's up to you.

Sponsor tier

Your name will appear as "sponsored by" when the game starts, before the title screen / main menu, as well as in the similar separate section in the game credits.

You can choose one of the following rewards: request a major feature or design a story.

Request a major feature

Any reasonably big feature you want to see in the game. I'll discuss it with you in detail. Note that some things might not be possible because of technical limitations (performance mostly) or too big for me to implement. I'm sure we'll be able to work out something for you.

Note that I also won't add features to the core game that change it too much from what I want it to be, but I might add them as optional mods / DLC. So if you really want to make the game into a sailing simulator or shaman dancing rhythm game, I can make that as a separate download-able content.

Design a story

As an alternative, you can design a fairly big story, involving multiple worlds, characters and nations. It'll be in every generated universe and it'll be really hard to miss if you complete the game. You can design it in detail or just tell me to "make a story about this and that", it's up to you.

Again, if I feel it changes the game too much from what I want it to be, I might release it as an optional DLC instead of adding it to the core game.

The usual risk of game development is running out of time/money while not getting the project to the completion. I'm going to implement critical features first: buildings and towns, humanoids, AI, rune magic and Abominations. Then I'll make a simple story using that stuff to find out how much time it takes me to create one. I'll then scale the size of the story mode depending on how much time/money I still have.

I'll need some extra money for Linux and Mac ports, to buy BASS licenses and a Mac to build and test the game on, as well as to cover the development time. If I only get the amount I'm asking for, I'm going to do that post-release, using the sales income.

Hopefully, the campaign will attract more attention to Arcane Worlds, resulting in more sales on Early Access. That'll help to alleviate the risks, but I'm not counting on it.

    Spread the word about the campaign, both online and offline. You can use the links at the top of the page, below the video to easily share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and Google Plus.

    Play the demo and tell people what you think. Getting the word out is just as important as the contributions themselves, and I really appreciate all the help I can get.
