story:
Space Fight

Spacefight is a science fiction RTS. Players build buildings just like in a conventional RTS but units are automated. The idea is to reduce micro-management and make it a slower paced game where you consider your moves thoughtfully before committing resources to them. There are elements of tower defence to the gameplay, but it is much deeper than that. Players build a base including resource production,  unit production and defensive buildings. The units fly off and fight with each other and attempt to destroy the enemy base.

It is designed for both single and multiplayer, and will be released for Mac, Windows and as a browser game. The browser version lacks multiplayer due to browser security settings.

The Prototype

This is a playable prototype I have already made, and I want funding to finish it. Below is a link to the page where you can download the game or play it in your browser:

http://www.gametheatre.org/cms/tiki-index.php?page=Welcome

The gameplay is fairly repetitive at the moment, bear in mind the prototype is just for demonstration purposes.

Future Plans

There are many features planned which will make the game exciting, competitive and unique. One of the most important of these will be a system of damage/armour types, which will provide a sort of "rock/paper/scissors" quality to the gameplay. You might think you have an unstoppable army off laser wielding ships, only to find your opponent has installed special reflective armour that bounce lasers off without flinching. So you refit all your ships to carry missiles and projectile weapons that will shatter the brittle armour easily. A second feature that will change the combat dynamic a lot will be the addition of simulated aiming calculations. Instead of all your shots automatically hitting the server will calculate the relative trajectories, velocities and accuracy of ships and weapons so that it will no longer be possible to drop bombs on interceptors. In addition to that the AI algorithms of ships are going to be upgraded, so that they no longer simply make for the closest target and blindly chase it. This will be done by giving the AI a javascript based scripting interface, based on the Jurassic interpreter.  This will allow me as a developer to quickly program interesting and unique behaviour modes for each ship type, and in addition to this will allow those players who wish to, to customise these scripts or even write their own meaning you will not be able to easily predict how your enemies' ships will behave. 

Video music: "Space" by RagePotato. http://soundcloud.com/ragepotato/space

Game background by NASA: http://www.nasa.gov/

I am trying to establish myself as an independent game designer, through working on my own game ideas and distributing them for free. I have a large number of ideas, many of them quite ambitious. For me it is all about gameplay and innovation, not money, but it is hard to get by without any support at all. 

Funding

I am not comfortable with the way copyright law currently works, I believe people should get paid for their time and effort. If this project is funded I will spend the money paying myself minimum wage to work on finishing and polishing this project. I may spend some of the money hiring other people to help me, especially with art assets, but the bottom line is every dollar will translate to a measurable amount of work done on the game. I am also using a fixed funding model for this project so if it doesn't get fully funded no one will pay me anything. Success in this project will enable me to continue on bringing quality free content for all into the future.

Perks

I am not offering any stuff, it seems silly to ask for money and then spend it on t-Shirts and coffee mugs. Perks for donators include things that cost no money, but still recognise their generosity. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even more important than funding, I need a supportive community. Play my games, post on the forums on my website, offer suggestions and encouragement. I will listen to all feedback and would love the chance to tailor my projects to suit those people who take the time to tell me what they want. After all I am making games not just for myself, but for you as well.

story:
Overview

Madness Rush is an 3d runner mobile game

A colorful adventure game with stylized graphics and different scenes and  different characters to play with

it's single player game the player have to run into the  under maintenance park and  escape from the guard who wants to catch him

player  will collect coins and use them to buy and unlock character , vehicles , power-ups

Also will Collect daily gift , open mystery boxes to get special rewards and try lucky wheel to get some rewards 

 

 

About me

I am graphic designer from small city in Egypt with 15 years experience of graphic design ,

when i was child i always love to play video games and watch 3d cartoon movies i remember my first 3d cartoon movie i watched was A Bug's Life and at this time i wondered how they can make the 3d graphics of this movie so i decided to search and learn ,

then after few years i  become professional 3d graphic designer and and that become my career

from five years i heard about unity3d engine then i thought maybe  i can use my skills to make games so i searched more and decided to learn the programing and after three years of learning i started this project 

 

 

What I Need 

I don't have budget so i worked on this project only my self in my spare time i am working two years on this game and every thing is done by me only  but i need help to complete and improve the game and for publish it 

 

 

my goal

The money will be used for the following:

-buy unity 3d pro licenses
-buy apple ios developer account 
-pay to programmer to help me to improve the game and to make the ios version
-pay to a sound designer to make the sound effects, and background musics for the different scenes in the game 
-Advertising costs

your help meaning every thing for me it can change my life and can make my dream come true, 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are interested in this game please share this page and tell your friends, Thanks to everyone who does , help us spread the word by facebooking, tweeting, or sharing this URL.

Thank you so much for your support

story:
Download the demo from itch.io. The first chapter is about Haruka (without additional content)! Click here!

Also you can dowload it directly from Google Drive and GameJolt

 

It's a VN made in the anime style of the 80's and 90's. It's about a guy who's on the hunt for panties of pretty girls. A fun, unpredictable Point&Click adventure filled with danger.

The story is about a young man who values women's beauty and especially the beauty of women's underwear. He is a jack of all trades and knows thousands of ways to get into the house of beautiful girl. It's not easy to find panties because decent girls don't store them in conspicuous places and wouldn't a strangers to take their underwear... unless they like him.

"I'm trying to find panties and it's really difficult." - Noble
"It's the dark souls of detective games 10/10" - IGN (Not the company, just a random guy on YouTube)
"Omae wa mou shindeiru" - Chair, 2018

 

This game is short but full of events. We won't bother you with tiresome combining or boring puzzles. You'll just have to find a girl's panty before you'll be able to continue.

 

Three girls. Three chapters. Each girl has three extra chapters revealing their mysterious past. You can achieve many different endings in each one of them. It might be a bit tricky to get to the true ending though.

 

Many people think that this game is about a pervert but it's not. This story isn't about panties but about people. You communicate with a girl, try to solve her problems, reveal character traits and learn something new about characters including the protagonist. In a process you open additional scenes telling about the past of the girls, drama in their life, funny situations and relationships. The main goal of the game is to give the player a funtime, jokes, pranks and unexpected moments. We are interested in the idea of getting into a women's apartment, seeing this girl's life from the inside and getting acquainted with women's problems. Where panties are an excellent occasion for creating a comedy and challenge but the main goal of the player remains to achive the TRUE ending.

 

 

All our projects are inspired by the retro style of old movies and anime. We very carefully approached the realization of this style. We had to explore a lot of different processing techniques, learned the principles of programming etc. In the future we plan to develop this style to make it better and better. But it's not only the style that we like. The era itself is very inspiring for us. It seems like those times were filled with something joyous, light and carefree. As if people had stronger feelings and love. They fought for love and happiness аnd certainly found that. Our game is supposed to give you this wonderful feeling of pure and undisturbed romance and to dip you into this beautiful nostalgic era.

 

MULTILANGUAGE

Hi! We're two young people united by the love for unusual atmospheric and beautiful games. We also share love for anime and films from the 80's - 90's. We've just begun our journey with an easy, pleasant and sweet project. This project is our first attempt. With your support we'll be able to use our full potential!

Unfortunately, we are nameless people, we don't yet have pages in social networks (but we're planning).
I am the organizer of this project, the game design, the author of the idea and part of the script, music.
And  artist - the creator of a magical atmosphere, design. 

 

Creating games is our dream. Quite recently we thought it might be impossible. We've been stuck in our boring jobs, but there was always a glimmer of light and hope in us! And now we're close to achieve our first goal. We found out about Indiegogo and thought it's an excellent platform for our start. We chose "FIXED FUNDING" because we trust you and believe in our project. Making games is much harder than we thought it would be. It wasn't easy to realize our project without money but despite all the difficulties, we've developed a demo version. 60% of the graphics and the script is ready. And now you can help us achieve our final goal. We've put a lot of energy into the game. It's our pass into the bright world of videogames. Yes, we are newbies, but we believe in our talents and hope for your support!

 

 

Working in a team isn't easy. It's very difficult to find reliable people. We replaced five programmers who contributed to the project and the result was a mess in the Unity-project, but fortunately everything worked out. We put so much effort and money in this project that there is a zero chance that this game won't come out. But without the required amount of money, the development might slow down. We plan to release the game at best in summer at worst in fall. Your support will allow us to quit our jobs and focus on the development of wonderful games.

You can also support us using PayPal. Be sure to note down the price of the perk you want!
PAYPAL.ME

05.25.2018 - $10
story_txt:
Download the demo from itch.io. The first chapter is about Haruka (without additional content)! Click here!
Also you can dowload it directly from Google Drive and GameJolt
 

It's a VN made in the anime style of the 80's and 90's. It's about a guy who's on the hunt for panties of pretty girls. A fun, unpredictable Point&Click adventure filled with danger.
The story is about a young man who values women's beauty and especially the beauty of women's underwear. He is a jack of all trades and knows thousands of ways to get into the house of beautiful girl. It's not easy to find panties because decent girls don't store them in conspicuous places and wouldn't a strangers to take their underwear... unless they like him.
"I'm trying to find panties and it's really difficult." - Noble"It's the dark souls of detective games 10/10" - IGN (Not the company, just a random guy on YouTube)"Omae wa mou shindeiru" - Chair, 2018

 
This game is short but full of events. We won't bother you with tiresome combining or boring puzzles. You'll just have to find a girl's panty before you'll be able to continue.

 
Three girls. Three chapters. Each girl has three extra chapters revealing their mysterious past. You can achieve many different endings in each one of them. It might be a bit tricky to get to the true ending though.
  

Many people think that this game is about a pervert but it's not. This story isn't about panties but about people. You communicate with a girl, try to solve her problems, reveal character traits and learn something new about characters including the protagonist. In a process you open additional scenes telling about the past of the girls, drama in their life, funny situations and relationships. The main goal of the game is to give the player a funtime, jokes, pranks and unexpected moments. We are interested in the idea of getting into a women's apartment, seeing this girl's life from the inside and getting acquainted with women's problems. Where panties are an excellent occasion for creating a comedy and challenge but the main goal of the player remains to achive the TRUE ending.
 




 

All our projects are inspired by the retro style of old movies and anime. We very carefully approached the realization of this style. We had to explore a lot of different processing techniques, learned the principles of programming etc. In the future we plan to develop this style to make it better and better. But it's not only the style that we like. The era itself is very inspiring for us. It seems like those times were filled with something joyous, light and carefree. As if people had stronger feelings and love. They fought for love and happiness аnd certainly found that. Our game is supposed to give you this wonderful feeling of pure and undisturbed romance and to dip you into this beautiful nostalgic era.
 
MULTILANGUAGE

Hi! We're two young people united by the love for unusual atmospheric and beautiful games. We also share love for anime and films from the 80's - 90's. We've just begun our journey with an easy, pleasant and sweet project. This project is our first attempt. With your support we'll be able to use our full potential!
Unfortunately, we are nameless people, we don't yet have pages in social networks (but we're planning).I am the organizer of this project, the game design, the author of the idea and part of the script, music.And  artist - the creator of a magical atmosphere, design. 
 

Creating games is our dream. Quite recently we thought it might be impossible. We've been stuck in our boring jobs, but there was always a glimmer of light and hope in us! And now we're close to achieve our first goal. We found out about Indiegogo and thought it's an excellent platform for our start. We chose "FIXED FUNDING" because we trust you and believe in our project. Making games is much harder than we thought it would be. It wasn't easy to realize our project without money but despite all the difficulties, we've developed a demo version. 60% of the graphics and the script is ready. And now you can help us achieve our final goal. We've put a lot of energy into the game. It's our pass into the bright world of videogames. Yes, we are newbies, but we believe in our talents and hope for your support!
 


 

Working in a team isn't easy. It's very difficult to find reliable people. We replaced five programmers who contributed to the project and the result was a mess in the Unity-project, but fortunately everything worked out. We put so much effort and money in this project that there is a zero chance that this game won't come out. But without the required amount of money, the development might slow down. We plan to release the game at best in summer at worst in fall. Your support will allow us to quit our jobs and focus on the development of wonderful games.
You can also support us using PayPal. Be sure to note down the price of the perk you want!PAYPAL.ME

05.25.2018 - $10

story:
Introducing Transfer Window - a parody board game!

Have you ever wondered what goes on behind the scenes at your favourite club? Have you ever felt horribly confused and disoriented by the Kafkaesque nature of Transfer Policies?

Ever thought, just maybe, that you could do a better job?

Well now you can!

 

Calling all Liverpool FC fans in the multiverse: this is an invitation to experience the thrill of the chase, the intrigue of rivalry, and an all-permeating sense of dread!

You are the manager of Redmen FC, and this is your mission: negotiate the labyrinthine chaos of the transfer window, avoid the machinations of your owner Don.W. Percy, chief executive Steve Breeze and the Transfer Committee, and emerge victorious against great odds!

Compete against your friends to collect Klopp Tokens and Work Permits, offload the Chaff in your squad to Wigburn Athletic (or dump them on rival players!), and avoid the pitfalls of costly PR gaffes. As you close in on your dream signing you reach the 11TH HOUR. Will Tottenham whisk your target away in front of your very eyes? Or will that bothersome ACL tear mean a failed medical? the tension is palpable!

Only one player can win the race...

some examples of chaff player cards below ;

This comedy board game is a one-off limited offer!

We don't aim to personally profit from it - the idea is to raise a smile among football fans and hopefully provide a humorous antidote to the greedy world of big sport.

We have found a manufacturer who can produce the whole game en-masse in time for December - their minimum order quantity is 500 units, which leads nicely to our fundraising target (500 x £15 = £7500). The design is finished, we just need your help to make it become a reality (and an LFC cult rarity ;-)    ).

Any proceeds left over after successful delivery will go to Alder Hey Children's Charity. It should make a great Christmas gift for the hardened cynical red ;).

No project is without risks, so these are what we see as the key risks:

One of the main risks is ensuring quality control with our supplier. We are in the process of negotiating this. We get one shot if we are to achieve Christmas delivery, so we will be asking for proof of compliance to design before we pay the balance on the manufactured units.

Other challenges have included getting the balance of the game right, which we have now managed but involved writing a computer code to test the mechanics.

I suppose the Indiegogo Fundraising is one of the biggest challenges as this process is new to us; the onus is on us to link in to social media and plug the project on as many platforms as we can. We will update as we go as well, to keep the buzz going among backers.

The final challenge is logistical. We need to import a pallet of over 500 units, inspect, package and dispatch all of them. We have some empty commercial space lined up in December to do this.

Hopefully we will meet our target and a bunch of lucky UK Reds fans will have a unique present to show off at Christmas :)

story:
"With all the usual strategy game busywork taken out, planning the village roads and delivery routes has a classic feel that fed some long forgotten neural pathways." - Ben Barret, Rock, Paper, Shotgun

"It’s so awesome." - Jorge Figueiredo, Toronto Thumbs

With Northward we want to create a co-op experience that we feel is missing on the market. Management games are often a very solitary experience and we want to change that! Planning your next move, optimizing your shared resources and having to handle catastrophic events is something we believe is a lot more fun when shared with a friend.
   We're planning to develop the multiplayer through Steam and thereby we are targeting Steam as our only platform. We need your help to get greenlit!


Pre-alpha demo

With the pre-alpha demo we want to let you get your hands on the game right away and experience the basics of the gameplay by playing through a short scenario. Keep in mind that the gameplay in the pre-alpha won't mirror the final version of Northward, as the current system is very rough around the edges and many features have yet to be implemented into the game. There will definitely be bugs and issues in the pre-alpha that won't remain at the time of release.

       Download the pre-alpha for:

                            

                                                 Alternate download links:
                                                     Windows Mac Linux


The soundtrack for our last game Oknytt by Kristoffer Beijer is out for FREE. 

Download

For Northward, the talented Shane Mesa will compose the music. 

Check out the preview track below!




A great fog has been making its way down the mountains in the north, devouring everything in its wake, leaving only husks of what was once living beings. Villages swallowed by the fog have slowly turned silent and the inhabitants have one by one left their homes, wandering into the forest never to return.

Protected by an ancient relic passed down through generations, your villagers travel northward in search of the source to the corruption. As you make your journey across the uncharted land you will encounter other tribes, wild beasts, ancient artifacts and mysterious deities. What fate awaits you beyond the fog?

Experience the online co-op campaign together with a friend.

Journey together into the fog and overcome the challenges that lurk within. Communicating, setting goals and distributing tasks amongst yourselves will be necessary in order to survive. Will you declare yourself the explorer, administrator or commander?

Gather resources to expand your settlement.

Your villagers are the ones that will collect and transport resources, as well as constructing buildings. Each worker have their own task that they will carry out. Making sure all inhabitants have a busy schedule is a cornerstone of creating an efficient village.

Cast spells and explore the vast Nordic landscape with your village elder.

                                       

Each of the players will be able to pick one of several elders to control. The mobility of your elder will provide you with the ability to scout ahead and explore the environment in order to decide where to go next. Should danger be imminent you will have powerful enchantments to rely on as you make your escape back to the village. Sorcery is not only for combat, but can also be used to improve productivity in your village with auras or other helpful spells.

Defend your settlement against beings lurking in the fog.

Erecting defensive structures along the front lines will ensure the safety of your villagers as they build expansions for your settlement. Always be on your guard, you never know what may emerge from the fog.

Connect multiple industrial centers with transport routes.

Optimizing the infrastructure of your village to grant your villagers safe and quick passage when transporting resources and creating an even flow of transport will ensure your success in each area you explore.

Sacrifice to gain the boon of the ancient ones.

Tribes across the land have their own respective deities they idolize. Some are kind to their followers, some take pleasure in their torment. Will you take a chance and show your devotion?

Journey across Nordic landscapes as you unravel the secrets of the world.

The road north will take you through grassy fields, dark forests and treacherous swamps as you make your way to ascend the snowy mountains.






Should we reach our initial funding goal, this is how the money would be distributed:

  • Tax & administrative costs – €11200. Paying tax and running the company during development is a mandatory cost in order to be able to work on the game.
  • Indiegogo - €1280. A standard fee is payed by all projects once funded through Indiegogo.
  • Paypal transaction fees - €1280. Transactions across the globe from different countries carries with it various fees depending on how large of a sum is transferred and from which country.
  • Audio - €3520. We will create the sound effects ourselves but we need a professional to compose the soundtrack for the game, hopefully the talented Shane Mesa who made the music for the trailer and demo. A great atmosphere is important to us and the music plays a big role in achieving that.
  • Software - €1920. In order to make the game reach it's potential we need to buy a few software licences, primarily a Pro license for Unity. 
  • Programming, graphics and game design - €7680 total. We will handle these areas of the development in-house and the money will go toward salaries.
  • Game testing - €2560 An important part of developing any game is quality assurance and making sure most bugs and balance issues get weeded out before release.
  • PR - €2560. Getting word of Northward out there by continuous contact with the press, social media as well as the creation of promotional material and trailers.


After finishing our last game, Oknytt, we wanted to create something other than another single player game, a more social experience with players interacting with one another. That is how the idea for Northward came into existence. Multiplayer games bring another layer of fun that we want to explore with this project as well as a new take on the beautiful Nordic landscape that surrounds us.

Working on the game, apart from the staff at Nemoria, the talented Shane Mesa will be composing the soundtrack for Northward. He’s currently the Audio Director of the popular MOTHER 4 project and is collaborating with us to bring the world of Northward to life.

We are here on IndieGoGo because we want to be able to keep working full time on the game after the initial months of laying the groundwork are over. Funds raised will go towards costs such as outsourced music, software as well as sustaining the three people working on Northward. That said, we are also very curious to see if there’s interest for a game like this, if it's something that other people are craving as much as we are!


Project risks

Our past experience with game development makes it easier this time around, but every project has its own challenges.

There are many unknown factors that could be thrown into the cogs of development such as technical problems, bugs, injury or simply underestimating the workload of certain parts of the game. Sometimes the plan you had for the game changes when you come to certain realizations, a feature didn't turn out as expected or something fatal happens that you wouldn't have been able to predict early in development. When this happens, naturally the development time will increase as well.

We will do our utmost to bring you a quality product and steer away from any dangerous situations that we see approaching!


Spread the word!

Even if you can't contribute through backing, there are ways to help us get the game finished!

Telling your friends about the campaign, sharing it through social media such as Facebook and Twitter or even making a Youtube video is extremely helpful to us. It is not easy to get the word out there and with your help we can reach even more people!

We welcome your involvement in the development process and we would love to hear your ideas! Head over to the forums and let us know what you think about the game!

story:
“Through the fog the adventurer made out a dark outline of the huge castle. In spite of the rain, his soaked tattered map had served him in good stead. He had nothing left but his beloved sword, the remnants of his battered armor and an extraordinary artifact - the swordbreaker. The hero looked around and cautiously stepped onto the castle bridge...”

Main features of the game:

  • A compelling totally non-linear game story
  • Various endings
  • A huge mysterious castle
  • Lots of exciting locations and events
  • Impressive enemies and inhabitants of the castle
  • Absolutely stunning artwork
  • Achievement system

This game is about a hero who, as fate would have it, finds himself in an abandoned castle. There will be many obstacles on his way to the treasure hidden somewhere inside, with most remarkable adversaries he will have to face and mysteries to unravel. All this to receive his well-earned reward in the end!

The Swordbreaker gives you a rare opportunity to find yourself in interactive fiction, where each player has their own storyline to develop. Every action or decision will have an effect on how the story unfolds and how it all ends. Some moves you make will change your character's karma, and others can lead you to the darkest corners of the castle, so be careful! Because any step you take may turn out to be the last one!

On his way, the hero will encounter many different characters and creatures that can be neutral, dangerous or friendly towards him, as well as various objects you can use in a number of situations, sometimes in most unusual ways. Interaction with other characters will change the course of the story. You can either fight or make friends with them, talk or stay away from them – the choice is yours.

There are more than 40 different characters in the game, so here we’re only going to show you some of them. You will meet the rest when you start exploring the castle.

The protagonist is a bounty hunter known by his alias as the «Swordbreaker». He used to be a knight at the King's service but decided to resign and become a bounty hunter. He is not averse to any work he can get his hands on, and even looking for lost treasures. It was pure luck when once he got hold of a map that leads to a treasury in an ancient castle…

In the game, you will find illustrated scenes with captions to fill you in. Each scene will give you several options to choose from. Any of them will have an actual effect on how the story develops, which gives you a chance to complete the game in many different ways. In other words, if you finish just one storyline, you will only see one version of events. But don’t worry, you’ll have the map of the castle with myriads of rooms to keep things straight.

We did our best to improve the classic text adventures by adding some breathtaking artwork to the game so that you can find it easier to follow the storyline and feel the spirit of the cruel, dark castle.


We’re developing the Swordbreaker for Windows, Linux and MacOS, but if we raise more money, we’ll add Android and iOS platforms too.

Our professional artist is trying very hard to capture every detail of the gloomy but enchanting atmosphere of the game, so that the illustrations can convey all the adventurer’s feelings.

And this is how we work on our illustrations:


So far, we have made considerable progress:

  • Script at 100%;
  • Artwork at 80%;
  • Programming at 20%;
  • The soundtrack is ready, but we would like to re-record it, so that’s 50%.

If you’d like to know what to expect and what the game would look like, we’ve released a demo-version for Android OS. The game demo is in Russian and English (don’t mind the mistakes, it will be translated again by a professional translator). It’s short, but can still give you an idea of what the full version is going to be like.

To contact us, please follow these links:
Official site of the game: http://ducats-games.com/swordbreaker-the-game/

Our Facebook group [ENG]: https://www.facebook.com/groups/swordbreakergame/

Our community on VK [RUS]: http://vk.com/swordbreakergame

Swordbreaker Demo on Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.swordbreaker.game.demo.android

We also already pass Steam Greenlight:

You can view game page here: http://steamcommunity.com//sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=457597315

Why we need your help:

  • To complete the artwork;
  • To make the game available on various platforms;
  • To create atmospheric soundtrack;
  • To provide high-quality translation into other languages.
If we raise more money than expected:
  • We will add more languages;
  • We will compile the game for other platforms;

DuCats Games Studio is a promising game development team, and we really need your support!

Authors:

  • Script-writer & team manager: Alexander Subbotinov (https://www.facebook.com/coldronborn);
  • Programmer & QA: Mikhail Ivanov (https://www.facebook.com/mikamikumik);
  • Artist: Evgeny Shantarin (https://www.facebook.com/rayvellbook);

We hope you’ll enjoy the game and support us!
story_txt:
“Through the fog the adventurer made out a dark outline of the huge castle. In spite of the rain, his soaked tattered map had served him in good stead. He had nothing left but his beloved sword, the remnants of his battered armor and an extraordinary artifact - the swordbreaker. The hero looked around and cautiously stepped onto the castle bridge...”



Main features of the game:
    

A compelling totally non-linear game story
Various endings
A huge mysterious castle
Lots of exciting locations and events
Impressive enemies and inhabitants of the castle
Absolutely stunning artwork
Achievement system


        This game is about a hero who, as fate would have it, finds himself in an abandoned castle. There will be many obstacles on his way to the treasure hidden somewhere inside, with most remarkable adversaries he will have to face and mysteries to unravel. All this to receive his well-earned reward in the end! 


The Swordbreaker gives you a rare opportunity
to find yourself in interactive fiction, where each player has their own
storyline to develop. Every action or decision will have an effect on how the
story unfolds and how it all ends. Some moves you make will change your
character's karma, and others can lead you to the darkest corners of the
castle, so be careful! Because any step you take may turn out to be the last
one!


On his way, the hero will encounter many
different characters and creatures that can be neutral, dangerous or friendly
towards him, as well as various objects you can use in a number of situations,
sometimes in most unusual ways. Interaction with other characters will change
the course of the story. You can either fight or make friends with them, talk
or stay away from them – the choice is yours.
There are more than 40 different characters in the game, so here we’re only
going to show you some of them. You will meet the rest when you start exploring
the castle.


The
protagonist is a bounty hunter known by his alias as the «Swordbreaker». He
used to be a knight at the King's service but decided to resign and become a
bounty hunter. He is not averse to any work he can get his hands on, and even
looking for lost treasures. It was pure luck when once he got hold of a map
that leads to a treasury in an ancient castle…

In the game,
you will find illustrated scenes with captions to fill you in. Each scene will
give you several options to choose from. Any of them will have an actual effect
on how the story develops, which gives you a chance to complete the game in
many different ways. In other words, if you finish just one storyline, you will
only see one version of events. But don’t worry, you’ll have the map of the
castle with myriads of rooms to keep things straight.
We did
our best to improve the classic text adventures by adding some breathtaking artwork
to the game so that you can find it easier to follow the storyline and feel the
spirit of the cruel, dark castle.



We’re
developing the Swordbreaker for
Windows, Linux and MacOS, but if we raise more money, we’ll add Android and iOS
platforms too.



Our professional artist is trying
very hard to capture every detail of the gloomy but enchanting atmosphere of
the game, so that the illustrations can convey all the adventurer’s feelings.


And this is how we
work on our illustrations:

So far, we have made considerable progress:


Script at
100%;

Artwork
at 80%;

Programming
at 20%;

The
soundtrack is ready, but we would like to re-record it, so that’s 50%.

If you’d
like to know what to expect and what the game would look like, we’ve released a
demo-version for Android OS. The game demo is in Russian and English (don’t
mind the mistakes, it will be translated again by a professional translator).
It’s short, but can still give you an idea of what the full version is going to
be like.

story:
Hi

I'm Danko, a programmer from Riga, Latvia. I'm usually too busy doing boring stuff to write games, but this time I decided to join Linux Game Jam 2017 and try to make a game I've always wanted to play.

It didn't go too well. I spent so much time on organizing data structures, writing networking code and throwing together at least some user interface that I didn't get to actual game mechanics. The jam isn't over yet, but I can't realistically do proper gameplay in the hours left and hacking something quickly together just to throw it away later is not how I like to approach things.

So here's the deal - please give me money so I can make this playable. The more you give me now, the less angry people there will be when we go into good ol' "early access" (where "early" usually stands for "we ran out of money too early"). And of course you get the game and perks!

The game

You can see what's already done on my Itch.io page (spoiler: not much). The source is also available on my Bitbucket (and I'm not sure whether it'll stay that way). Much more importantly, here's what I plan to do:

  • Hundreds if of differrent goods with thousands of varieties, each with their own properties, produced by different means - by growing, mining, combining, processing and so on. Do you want to add your orange juice to your sparkling water and put it in a glass bottle? Now you can!
  • Tens of kinds of machinery you can arrange in the businesses to make exactly what you want. Do you want to produce 4-core CPUs for those new laptops of yours yourself? Why not, just start with some silica and copper and up the chain you go.
  • Transport things around with trucks and trains and pipes. Go to factory A and load half a truck of orange soda, then go to B and get those laptops, then drop it all off at department store C for the clerks to sort it into shelves. And of course the vehicles are also manufactured and have differrent varieties and qualities.
  • Different selling tactics you can employ to earn money. Not only you can sell that orange juice in your grocery store, you can also sell it to your competitors. Or you can offer them that juicer you accidentally designed in the process so they can make their own. Or do both - diversify and grow!
  • Tens of thousands of consumers each simulated individually with their own traits, desires and problems. Most of them won't buy a new sofa if they haven't eaten for days, but some of them won't even buy food if it's too expensive, while others prefer meals in cafes with reputation for high quality.
  • Economy that makes sense. No one will pay you just for transporting coal from one edge of the map to the other if you didn't have to do that at all. And most customers won't buy a new TV every month since they usually last for years, so be careful not to over-saturate the market.
  • Multiplayer and AIs because it's not a particularly good business simulation if you're the only business on the map. And it would be hard to produce that laptop fast if you had to mine all the minerals and research all the technology yourself, so the AIs might actually be helpful!
  • Lots of little things to make game not just realistic but also actually fun. We'll keep trying stuff until we get the perfect formula (or run out of money - see "early access").
  • Windows, OS X, Linux, Android and iOS support (and maybe a web version too).

The campaign

All of the money raised will go towards making Supply a better game. There will be no stretch goals because there is just one goal.

Obviously, a good game costs much more than $1500 to make, so I don't promise the game will be good after I eat this chunk of money up, but I promise it will be good enough to ask more people for more money :)

The campaign is "flexible" which means I get the money regardless of whether we hit the goal or not, and I'll use it towards the game in any case, but no promises of playability in that case, sorry.

I've set the initial timeframe to 15 days, which isn't much but hopefully will be enough to raise enough awareness to gather the $1.5k. If not, Indiegogo says I can extend it and I probably will.

story:
Smoke 'em Mon  is the Smoking, Drinking, Whatever else you might be thinking battle monster card game! The Smoke 'em Mon world full of smokies to befriend, party with and battle!

The first incarnation of this world is Smoke 'em Mon the trading card game which features 101 brand new monsters and very original mechanic that requires a little something special to power up. 

It all started as all great things over "talking" with friends. The idea grew and grew over 6+ years and finally became one kick-ass card game that I can't wait to share with you all.

My name's Shaun Gilchrist, I'm a designer/artist from Sydney, Australia. I made Smoke 'em Mon with the help of a whole bunch of very good friends who have chipped in with time, ideas, writing, music, character concepts and more to help make Smoke 'em Mon the great party game it is today.


I have taken Smoke 'em Mon as far as it can go without some help from you guys, all of the artwork and the game is complete and ready for printing. In order to afford the first print run i'm making the cards available Pre-Sale and including some very special perks!

For Smoke 'em Mon to become a reality we need to hit our funding goal in the short time we have left! If we don't reach our goal all supporters will be given given an immediate refund.


Here are some of the great perks that are exclusive to the Pre-Sales campaign!

Now if you've got way too much money, there's an even more expensive pack than that! Check out the side bar for more details on all the goodies on offer. If you have any questions don't hestiate to leave a comment or get in touch!

To reach all the people that I know will love Smoke 'em Mon as much as us we need to show it to as many people as possible, so the next best thing to buying some cards is telling others about Smoke 'em Mon.

So please share this around through word of mouth, social media, interpretive dance or any other way you can think of. It's going to take a huge group effort to make this happen, but I know we can do it!


Thanks so much for reading this far! I hope you love Smoke 'em Mon as much as I do, I can't wait to hear what everyone thinks. I'll be making daily updates throughout the campaign so come back soon for more details!

For more info on everything Smoke 'em Mon head over to the official website www.smokemon.com and feel free to get in touch with me on Twitter and Facebook (links below).

story:
The Game

Underglow takes place in an alternate past filled with mobsters and magic. The goal of the game is to take control of a noir themed city with your faction and gain more reputation than your opponents.

Use different strategies to overrule the other players. Control different colored resources to build up your forces or try your luck for bonus rep points. Either way, the city is up for the taking.


·  Underglow will feature 9+ playable kingpins, each with their own artwork and stats.

·  25 beautiful hex tiles to randomly generate a different city every time.

·  Different colored factions for up to 6 players.

·  Custom dice to add flavor to any match.


Who am I?

I am an independent game designer who is constantly thrilled about our love for games. Ever since I played my very first game, I was obsessed. I have always wanted to design and craft my own worlds for people to explore and experience. Today, with crowdfunding becoming a very powerful gift in helping people accomplish their dreams, I felt it was time for me to live mine.

Before crowdfunding, I really wanted to make a good quality game that was both presentable and original. I set out to execute many of my ideas over and over again to prove I was capable in bringing a new game to life. As a result, Underglow was created.


Budget

The game is currently in its beta phase and the only thing stopping me from getting any further are a few speed bumps. This is where I need your help!

First things first is that I need more presentable artwork for my game before I start sending it off. High quality Kingpin portraits and 3D modeling for the buildings tiles are currently in the works, but this requires more time and money.

Second is production costs. I will be using a website called Game Crafters to print and sell my games in order to keep my costs and fundraising goal lower. i will be doing this because lets face it, its expensive to print and sell games on your own. Here is their website if you are interested in what they do.

https://www.thegamecrafter.com/

Below are some works in progress that will be implemented into the game if I reach my goal.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute to my project financially, but would like to help, showing this to any of your gaming friends or family would help me an incredible amount. Also, if you are in the possession of a YouTube, forum or website themed around board games, email me. I would love to talk about sending a copy for a review. Lets make this game happen!

story:
LegendaryOnes.com is browser-based online PVP game set in dark-fantasy world of Teron. Champions are called to prove their merit on battlefield once again. Play as one of the thousands and become the greatest – The Chosen One. You will experience an exceptional game where you can personalize your character by outstanding number of 6 races, 18 classes, 93 skills, 33 weapons, 33 armors and 24 different socket gems. We offer extremely detailed graphics, many ways of building your champion and endless armies of other players to defeat!

Summary

In this game you will:

  • Play for your own personalized champion
  • Fight other players (champions) to loot their Gold
  • Improve your statistics, skills, weapons and armors
  • Discover different builds and skill paths
  • Enjoy short waiting times - you can play all day long (dev team will play as well)
  • Have fun! ;-) (this game is made by gamers for gamers)

Longer gameplay on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1YHntBV8YVk

Dark fantasy graphics that promises totally new gaming experience from other modern games.

No strict story to follow - just pure fantasy action. Perfect time-killer to school or work.

Build your champion the way you want. There are no restrictions. Do you want to add damage socket to armor? You can.

We have many stats in which you can improve your champion. Our statistics system allows to build many types of champions - damage dealer, critical strikes, bleeding, poison, tank and more!

Improving continues with skills, sockets and guilds. You can choose your development path in many ways.

You can play for any of our 6 races and 18 classes. Each race has three classes to choose from. There are Orc Destroyers and Shamans, Human Paladins, Undead Knights, Vampires, Werewolves, Dwarven Berserkers, Elven Assassins or Daemonic Barons and Fiends.

Simple combat system. Your task is to pick the right opponent and click attack. Everything is then solved automatically and fast. You can check result of every turn in battle report.

Weapons and armors with history stories. Every item has its own history and statistics you can read.

Common and unique quests that are here when you don't have time to look for opponent. You can make your champion doing something by just one click. Unique quests offer unique rewards that can change your game.

Revolutionary Vigilance system that defends casual players as anti-bullying system that will help you survive night by decreasing amount of stolen Gold every time you get attacked.

Guilds that can be upgraded with unique buildings!

 

 

Creating new champion is the initial step. First you pick a race. We have all popular fantasy races - Dwarves, Elves, Undead, Orcs, Daemons and Humans. Every race has 3 classes to select from. Picking a race gives player starting statistics. Picking a class modify these statistics even more. Also - every race and every class has its own unique skill that can't be obtained in the game for skills points. This system allows to deliver many different champions since level 1. Player can change champion's appearance by selecting different races. There are also three additional options - eyes color, skin texture and body extras like scars, tattoos or jewels to adjust appearance to your liking.

Complete table:

Human - Warrior, Paladin and Cleric

Dwarf - Berserker, Rune Guard and Iron Thane

Elf - Assassin, Duelist and Blade Dancer

Orc - Destroyer, Brute and Shaman

Undead - Knight, Nosferatu and Werewolf

Daemon - Hell Spawn, Baron and Fiend

 

*Creating new champion screen. Race: Undead. Class: Knight

 

Combat in LegendaryOnes.com works very simply. You go to leaderboard and you either find you opponent by hand, so you can pick the best target, or you can use in-game function to find random opponent that suits your level.

*Notice Guild banners next to player's name

You open enemy's overview and depending on his stats and skills or equipment you decide whether to attack or not. If you choose to attack the enemy, you click Attack button. Every battle is turn-based and works automatically. You will only see result of battle with details of every round.

*Attacking player (premium) facing defending player (free).

You may ask why we chose to do it this way. Why can't you select player who is online so you can battle in real time? We could do this, but not only it's technically much more complicated, it also doesn't offer that much flexibility of fighting any player you want. We wanted as fast action as possible. You can attack any player you want anytime except those who are just online.

*Every round can be clicked to see its details.

 

There are two types of items you can buy - weapons and armors. Equiping new armor change your champion's appearance. All other players can see what armor you wear. It makes the game much more dynamic and interesting, because wearing a Dragonscale armor is just badass. Every item has its own short story which adds more depth to the game.

*Some of our weapons without special effects.

*Two of our armors with socket gems.

 

Every item - weapon or armor - has certain number of free sockets. These sockets can be used as additional bonuses by adding sparkling gems inside.

Weapons and armors have between 1 and 6 sockets depending on its level. Higher level items have more free sockets. You can support your desirable champion build by obtaining these statistics here. Player can remove it from item anytime and insert different ones.

*Sockets customization screen.

 

Skills are the most important and unique feature in LegendaryOnes. Every new level grants additional skill point that can be spend on new skill. In addition to these visible skills, we also want to implement a moment of surprise. When player adds two linked visible skills, it will unlocks hidden skill which can be added next level.

 

*Skills customization screen.

 

Quests are an alternative activity to battles with other players. Common quests can be repeated endlessly and offer rewards between two random choices. Unique quests can be completed only once per Age. Every quest takes predefined time to complete. It ranges from 5 minutes to 23 hours.

 

*Unique quests screen.

 

Vigilance level is an anti-bullying system that indicates whether your champion is attacked repeatedly. Your champion can be under constant pressure of attacking players seeking your hard-earned Gold. This experience may be frustrating for some players, so we decided to implement our own system against it.

Vigilance level increases every time someone attacks you. The more it increases, the less Gold they loot you next time.

 

*You can hover over any Vigilance indicator to see current level. This level decreases looted Gold by 80 %.

 

Every Guild can have up to 10 members. These players can donate Gold to the Guild which increases its level. Higher levels unlocks ability to construct a building. It adds slight bonuses to all Guild members. There are 9 possible buildings granting different bonuses. You can check it below:

Thief Den +% looted Gold

Archery Range +Attack Rating

Training Yard +Defense Rating

Inn +Hitpoints

Temple +Hitpoints regeneration

Torture Chamber +Stamina

Blacksmith +Damage

Armory +Defense

Grinder +Critical chance

Every clan can build only 3 buildings. You can see that it will be important to primarily try to join Guilds that add bonuses for your build or you can create your own Guild as premium player. Guild tournaments are planned as an update.

*Building names are subject of change

*Guild detail

 

We want to have all players playing on one server without separating them among many different worlds. We also don't want to separate players to new and those who play for a long time. From this reason we came up with Ages. Every age will last from few to several months. By the end of the Age should be all player at max or near max level. After this period of time we will wipe all champions so all players can start again.

Prolonging game for high level players bring no good, because they are not only more and more distant from new players, but they also can't start again and try something new. We want to prevent that.

 

Although we are not some huge company that just needs to make money, we still need to have some business model for this game. We chose usual microtransaction model with slight difference. There is quite a lot of things you can buy for Premium currency from buying new races, decreasing waiting times, improving skills or sockets. However all of these bonuses are very little. Active free player will be able to beat Premium players. This game won't be pay-to-win. We chose to go with low fees that everybody can afford ranging from several cents to few dollars.

Who is behind LegendaryOnes.com?

Responsibility for development and all game aspects has Ing. Jan Zelinka from Czech Republic. Internet entrepreneur with 10 years of experience and hobbies in muscle cars, games and investing. He loves to play Diablo and Warcraft universe, Heroes of Might and Magic 3, UFO: Enemy Unknown and Disciples 2. His job is game design, UI graphics, adjusting works from artists, managing finance and marketing. Other team members are hired occasionally.

Mario Teodosio - Characters & armors illustration artist from Italy (Portfolio)

Daniel Franicolas – Background image artist from Philippines (Artstation)

Soós Gergő – Basic weapons illustration artist from Hungary (DeviantArt)

Daniel Larson - Main programmer from Australia (Official website)

 

Why Indiegogo?

It allows us to create campaign even though we are not originally from United States or other listed country in Kickstarter.

 

Tiers and Rewards

$2 package - Basic perk that will grant your name a noble place in our contributor's list on LegendaryOnes's website.

$10 package - We will add your name to our website as a contributor and offer you account with 3 months of free premium membership.

$25 package - You can sketch new weapon. We will use this weapon in-game, so every player will be able to obtain it. In addition you will receive 1 year of free premium membership.

$45 package - Pretty much the same as previous one, but armors are also visible on character's overview screen. We need to put more work to armor's artwork. In addition you will receive 1 year of free premium membership.

$75 package - You will be able to design one of our unique quests including rewards. Since then all players will be able to take this quest every Age. In addition you will receive 1 year of free premium membership.

$250 package - This one is really exciting! We will work together to design unique item you will have on your account forever. You can use it repeatedly every age since the beginning. You will also be able to design new race and three its classes. This will impact the whole game. In addition you will receive 1 year of free premium membership.

 

Risks and challenges

There are literally no risks in development. Contribution will speed up the process of development. The only challenge that we face is to deliver good product for all players around the world that will enhance their lives. We want to deliver something unexpected, different and enjoyable.

 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/legendaryonescom/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Legendary_Ones

 

Thank you for your time.

We will be grateful for any contribution.

Best regards,

- LegendaryOnes.com's Team
story_txt:
LegendaryOnes.com is browser-based online PVP game set in dark-fantasy world of Teron. Champions are called to prove their merit on battlefield once again. Play as one of the thousands and become the greatest – The Chosen One. You will experience an exceptional game where you can personalize your character by outstanding number of 6 races, 18 classes, 93 skills, 33 weapons, 33 armors and 24 different socket gems. We offer extremely detailed graphics, many ways of building your champion and endless armies of other players to defeat!SummaryIn this game you will:
Play for your own personalized champion
Fight other players (champions) to loot their Gold
Improve your statistics, skills, weapons and armors
Discover different builds and skill paths
Enjoy short waiting times - you can play all day long (dev team will play as well)
Have fun! ;-) (this game is made by gamers for gamers)
Longer gameplay on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1YHntBV8YVkDark fantasy graphics that promises totally new gaming experience from other modern games.No strict story to follow - just pure fantasy action. Perfect time-killer to school or work.Build your champion the way you want. There are no restrictions. Do you want to add damage socket to armor? You can.We have many stats in which you can improve your champion. Our statistics system allows to build many types of champions - damage dealer, critical strikes, bleeding, poison, tank and more!Improving continues with skills, sockets and guilds. You can choose your development path in many ways.You can play for any of our 6 races and 18 classes. Each race has three classes to choose from. There are Orc Destroyers and Shamans, Human Paladins, Undead Knights, Vampires, Werewolves, Dwarven Berserkers, Elven Assassins or Daemonic Barons and Fiends.Simple combat system. Your task is to pick the right opponent and click attack. Everything is then solved automatically and fast. You can check result of every turn in battle report.Weapons and armors with history stories. Every item has its own history and statistics you can read.Common and unique quests that are here when you don't have time to look for opponent. You can make your champion doing something by just one click. Unique quests offer unique rewards that can change your game.Revolutionary Vigilance system that defends casual players as anti-bullying system that will help you survive night by decreasing amount of stolen Gold every time you get attacked.Guilds that can be upgraded with unique buildings!  Creating new champion is the initial step. First you pick a race. We have all popular fantasy races - Dwarves, Elves, Undead, Orcs, Daemons and Humans. Every race has 3 classes to select from. Picking a race gives player starting statistics. Picking a class modify these statistics even more. Also - every race and every class has its own unique skill that can't be obtained in the game for skills points. This system allows to deliver many different champions since level 1. Player can change champion's appearance by selecting different races. There are also three additional options - eyes color, skin texture and body extras like scars, tattoos or jewels to adjust appearance to your liking.Complete table:Human - Warrior, Paladin and ClericDwarf - Berserker, Rune Guard and Iron ThaneElf - Assassin, Duelist and Blade DancerOrc - Destroyer, Brute and ShamanUndead - Knight, Nosferatu and WerewolfDaemon - Hell Spawn, Baron and Fiend *Creating new champion screen. Race: Undead. Class: Knight Combat in LegendaryOnes.com works very simply. You go to leaderboard and you either find you opponent by hand, so you can pick the best target, or you can use in-game function to find random opponent that suits your level.*Notice Guild banners next to player's nameYou open enemy's overview and depending on his stats and skills or equipment you decide whether to attack or not. If you choose to attack the enemy, you click Attack button. Every battle is turn-based and works automatically. You will only see result of battle with details of every round.*Attacking player (premium) facing defending player (free).You may ask why we chose to do it this way. Why can't you select player who is online so you can battle in real time? We could do this, but not only it's technically much more complicated, it also doesn't offer that much flexibility of fighting any player you want. We wanted as fast action as possible. You can attack any player you want anytime except those who are just online.*Every round can be clicked to see its details. There are two types of items you can buy - weapons and armors. Equiping new armor change your champion's appearance. All other players can see what armor you wear. It makes the game much more dynamic and interesting, because wearing a Dragonscale armor is just badass. Every item has its own short story which adds more depth to the game.*Some of our weapons without special effects.*Two of our armors with socket gems. Every item - weapon or armor - has certain number of free sockets. These sockets can be used as additional bonuses by adding sparkling gems inside.Weapons and armors have between 1 and 6 sockets depending on its level. Higher level items have more free sockets. You can support your desirable champion build by obtaining these statistics here. Player can remove it from item anytime and insert different ones.*Sockets customization screen. Skills are the most important and unique feature in LegendaryOnes. Every new level grants additional skill point that can be spend on new skill. In addition to these visible skills, we also want to implement a moment of surprise. When player adds two linked visible skills, it will unlocks hidden skill which can be added next level. *Skills customization screen. Quests are an alternative activity to battles with other players. Common quests can be repeated endlessly and offer rewards between two random choices. Unique quests can be completed only once per Age. Every quest takes predefined time to complete. It ranges from 5 minutes to 23 hours. *Unique quests screen. Vigilance level is an anti-bullying system that indicates whether your champion is attacked repeatedly. Your champion can be under constant pressure of attacking players seeking your hard-earned Gold. This experience may be frustrating for some players, so we decided to implement our own system against it.Vigilance level increases every time someone attacks you. The more it increases, the less Gold they loot you next time. *You can hover over any Vigilance indicator to see current level. This level decreases looted Gold by 80 %. Every Guild can have up to 10 members. These players can donate Gold to the Guild which increases its level. Higher levels unlocks ability to construct a building. It adds slight bonuses to all Guild members. There are 9 possible buildings granting different bonuses. You can check it below:Thief Den +% looted GoldArchery Range +Attack RatingTraining Yard +Defense RatingInn +HitpointsTemple +Hitpoints regenerationTorture Chamber +StaminaBlacksmith +DamageArmory +DefenseGrinder +Critical chanceEvery clan can build only 3 buildings. You can see that it will be important to primarily try to join Guilds that add bonuses for your build or you can create your own Guild as premium player. Guild tournaments are planned as an update.*Building names are subject of change*Guild detail We want to have all players playing on one server without separating them among many different worlds. We also don't want to separate players to new and those who play for a long time. From this reason we came up with Ages. Every age will last from few to several months. By the end of the Age should be all player at max or near max level. After this period of time we will wipe all champions so all players can start again.Prolonging game for high level players bring no good, because they are not only more and more distant from new players, but they also can't start again and try something new. We want to prevent that. Although we are not some huge company that just needs to make money, we still need to have some business model for this game. We chose usual microtransaction model with slight difference. There is quite a lot of things you can buy for Premium currency from buying new races, decreasing waiting times, improving skills or sockets. However all of these bonuses are very little. Active free player will be able to beat Premium players. This game won't be pay-to-win. We chose to go with low fees that everybody can afford ranging from several cents to few dollars.Who is behind LegendaryOnes.com?Responsibility for development and all game aspects has Ing. Jan Zelinka from Czech Republic. Internet entrepreneur with 10 years of experience and hobbies in muscle cars, games and investing. He loves to play Diablo and Warcraft universe, Heroes of Might and Magic 3, UFO: Enemy Unknown and Disciples 2. His job is game design, UI graphics, adjusting works from artists, managing finance and marketing. Other team members are hired occasionally.Mario Teodosio - Characters & armors illustration artist from Italy (Portfolio)Daniel Franicolas – Background image artist from Philippines (Artstation)Soós Gergő – Basic weapons illustration artist from Hungary (DeviantArt)Daniel Larson - Main programmer from Australia (Official website) Why Indiegogo?It allows us to create campaign even though we are not originally from United States or other listed country in Kickstarter. Tiers and Rewards$2 package - Basic perk that will grant your name a noble place in our contributor's list on LegendaryOnes's website.$10 package - We will add your name to our website as a contributor and offer you account with 3 months of free premium membership.$25 package - You can sketch new weapon. We will use this weapon in-game, so every player will be able to obtain it. In addition you will receive 1 year of free premium membership.$45 package - Pretty much the same as previous one, but armors are also visible on character's overview screen. We need to put more work to armor's artwork. In addition you will receive 1 year of free premium membership.$75 package - You will be able to design one of our unique quests including rewards. Since then all players will be able to take this quest every Age. In addition you will receive 1 year of free premium membership.$250 package - This one is really exciting! We will work together to design unique item you will have on your account forever. You can use it repeatedly every age since the beginning. You will also be able to design new race and three its classes. This will impact the whole game. In addition you will receive 1 year of free premium membership. Risks and challengesThere are literally no risks in development. Contribution will speed up the process of development. The only challenge that we face is to deliver good product for all players around the world that will enhance their lives. We want to deliver something unexpected, different and enjoyable. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/legendaryonescom/Twitter: https://twitter.com/Legendary_Ones Thank you for your time.We will be grateful for any contribution.Best regards,- LegendaryOnes.com's Team

story:
English PC version - 83,4 MB

Versión PC en Español - 83,4 MB

Mac version English/Spanish - 218.8 MB


Remember that this is an Alpha demo, we would love to improve several aspects of the game like the translation or even adding some voices. 

Right now the Demo is only available for PC as we will have to work on the Mac and Linux version once the game is finished.



In this game you play the role of Panchito Chepas,  a seemingly innocent character who has just come to a godforsaken town. You will discover that gold is the real engine of the town, and all the dirty tricks you know will be put to the test in order to acquire all the precious gold.


This is no game for a person of high morals; to get through you will have to be a real bastard.


We have been playing all sorts of adventure games since we were kids, and have grown up with the illusion of one day making one. We do not claim to be developing the best adventure ever, but certainly aim to leave our mark.

This is the first chapter of the game, if we reach our goal of making more chapters, then all of you who have donated € 5 or more will get all the chapters.


- A lot of ingenious and enjoyable puzzles.

- More than 20 crazy characters to trick and interact with.

- 30 scenarios and counting.

- About 40 items to pick up without any permission from the owners.

- Over 5000 hilarious dialog lines.

- 2000 hand drawed sprites.

- A delightful soundtrack.


*Note that these features are for the first chapter. 


To be available on:




This town was once a thriving place where gold mines were full, and its citizens were used to spend the precious metal in decadent vices. Now, prosperity has long gone, but not corruption. Thus, the once healthy town has been overrun by a plague of thieves, hustlers and all kind of scum. All of them lead by a ruthless and tyranical mayor. Anyway, there is still some remaining gold hidden in their houses and here is where Panchito comes in.

However, the game is not bound by the towns limits; you will find some other full of magic scenarios, to which civilisations reeks are only slowly starting to arrive.



We have chosen a simple style of clear line and plain colors, resembling the old European comic book tradition.


Characters and scenery have been designed as a mixture of classic western cinema and our own peculiar fantasy world.

The downfall of the town can be seen in every scenario, where rundown and abandoned buildings prevail.



We are working hard on the puzzles in our effort to maintain the taste of the old adventure games, where you had to rack your brains (but without risk of explosion). The puzzles that you would gradually solve after getting stuck sometimes, but would fill you with great satisfaction at the end.

We hope you enjoy them as much as we are doing creating them.




These are some of the characters of the game

Pantchito Chepas: He is the main character, just arrived in town and is already in jail for unknown crimes. He loves animals.


Mayor: A small charlatan who rules over the town. The only thing he longs for more than gold, is the power he obtains from it. He would sell his grandmother for a gold coin.


Camporedondo: This skinny and quiet guy is the town's sheriff. He wants to maintain law and order in Papadero Creek, so he will soon notice Panchito.

 

Troll: Captured and educated in the most rude and rough ways, this magic being guards the prison.

Truhan: Born in some far away lands, this charismatic trickster will make himself a name in town, and as much business as he can with Panchito.

And much more you will be able to discover in game.



We are a small company from Spain made up of three friends. We are nostalgic of old graphic adventures, and we want to create a game for our families to stop looking at us with pity and disgust.

These are our different tasks:

  -Eneko is the cartoonist and animator.

  -Charlie is the programmer.

  -Julen is the voice of reason behind the two of us.

However, the three of us work together in creating dialogues and puzzles, which we consider the pillars of the genre.



Being a small company with limited resources has made us come to the crowdfunding family. One of the reasons we are here is because crowdfunding could help us to dedicate ourselves full-time to our game.

We believe we can contribute somehow to the genre, so judging if we are worth giving a try is entirely up to you.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Which is your favourite animal?


“If the project gets finally funded, we will build our particular Noe’s arch in the form of a big drawing with all the backed animals and send a digital copy to all of you. Those animals who are not backed will be sacrificed, could you live with it?” 

Thank you for all your support!
